S04bsu036_u:247_0: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprayuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati

S04bsu036_u:249_0: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ candrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya
S04bsu036_u:249_1: pareṇa parataraṃ candrasūryapradīpa eva nāmnā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi /

S04bsu036_u:255_0: yaduta śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃyuktaṃ pratītyasamutpādapravṛttaṃ dharmaṃ deśitavān

S04bsu036_u:257: tasya khalu punarajita bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pūrvaṃ kumārabhūtasyānabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsasya aṣṭau putrā abhūvan /

S04bsu036_u:269: te taṃ bhagavantamabhiniṣkrāntagṛhāvāsaṃ viditvā anuttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaṃ śrutvā sarvarājyaparibhogānutsṛjya taṃ bhagavantamanu pravrajitāḥ /

S04bsu036_u:272_1: mahānirdeśaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ

S04bsu036_u:276: sarvāvacca tad buddhakṣetraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitamabhūt calitaṃ saṃpracalitaṃ vedhitaṃ saṃpravedhitaṃ kṣubhitaṃ saṃprakṣubhitam /
S04bsu036_u:277_0: tena khalu punarajita samayena tena kālena ye tasyāṃ parṣadi bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā

S04bsu036_u:280: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tasya bhagavataścandrasūryapradīpasya tathāgatasya bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośādekā raśmirniścaritā /
S04bsu036_u:282: tāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi sarvāṇi tasyā raśmeḥ prabhayā suparisphuṭāni saṃdṛśyante sma,
S04bsu036_u:283: tadyathāpi nāma ajita etarhyetāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante //
S04bsu036_u:284: tena khalu punarajita samayena tasya bhagavato viṃśatibodhisattvakoṭyaḥ samanubaddhā abhuvan /
S04bsu036_u:286: te āścaryaprāptā abhūvan adbhutaprāptā audbilyaprāptāḥ kautūhalasamutpannā etena mahāraśmyavabhāsenāvabhāsitaṃ lokaṃ dṛṣṭvā //
S04bsu036_u:287: tena khalu punarajita samayena tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane varaprabho nāma bodhisattvo 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:289: sa ca bhagavāṃstataḥ samādhervyutthāya taṃ varaprabhaṃ bodhisattvamārabhya saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayāmāsa /
S04bsu036_u:290: yāvat paripūrṇān ṣaṣṭyantarakalpān bhāṣitavān ekāsane niṣaṇṇo 'saṃpravedhamānena kāyena aniñjamānena cittena /
S04bsu036_u:291: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣadekāsane niṣaṇṇā tān ṣaṣṭyantarakalpāṃstasya bhagavato 'ntikāddharmaṃ śṛṇoti sma /
S04bsu036_u:292: na ca tasyāṃ parṣadi ekasattvasyāpi kāyaklamatho 'bhūt,

S04bsu036_u:294_3: sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyāḥ sadevamānuṣāsurāyāḥ
S04bsu036_u:294_4: purastāt - adya bhikṣavo 'syāmeva rātryāṃ madhyame yāme tathāgato 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti //
S04bsu036_u:295_0: atha khalvajita sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ śrīgarbhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:295_1: nāma bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtya tāṃ sarvāvatīṃ
S04bsu036_u:295_2: parṣadamāmantrayate sma - ayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ śrīgarbho bodhisattvo mamānantaramanuttarāṃ
S04bsu036_u:298: atha khalvajita sa bhagavāṃścandrasūryapradīpastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāmeva rātryāṃ madhyame yāme 'nupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:301: tatra ajita ye tasya bhagavato 'ṣṭau putrā abhūvan,

S04bsu036_u:308: teṣāṃ ca aṣṭānāmantevāsiśatānāmeko bodhisattvo 'dhimātraṃ lābhaguruko 'bhūt satkāraguruko jñātaguruko yaśaskāmaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:320: yathā bhagavānapi taṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sūtrāntaṃ mahāvaipulyaṃ bodhisattvāvavādaṃ sarvabuddhaparigrahaṃ bhāṣitukāmaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:321: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta etamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā pradarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -

S04bsu036_u:329: dharmaṃ ca so bhāṣati lokanātho anantanirdeśavaraṃ ti sūtram /

S04bsu036_u:361: lokasya cakṣuśca gatiśca tvaṃ vidurvaiśvāsiko dharmadharaśca mahyam /

S04bsu036_u:991: bhaviṣyase śārisutā tuhaṃ pi anāgate 'dhvāni jinastathāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:994: bahubuddhakoṭīṣu karitva satkriyāṃ caryābalaṃ tatra upārjayitvā /
S04bsu036_u:995: utpādayitvā ca daśo balāni spṛśiṣyase uttamamagrabodhim // Saddhp_3.24 //
S04bsu036_u:996: acintiye aparimitasmi kalpe prabhūtaratnastada kalpu bheṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:997: virajā ca nāmnā tada lokadhātuḥ kṣetraṃ viśuddhaṃ dvipadottamasya // Saddhp_3.25 //
S04bsu036_u:1001: ye śikṣitā buddhaśateṣu caryāṃ te tatra kṣetre upapadya santi // Saddhp_3.27 //
S04bsu036_u:1004: sama dvādaśā antarakalpa tasya bhaviṣyate āyu tadā jinasya /
S04bsu036_u:1005: manujānapī antarakalpa aṣṭa āyuṣpramāṇaṃ tahi teṣa bheṣyati // Saddhp_3.29 //
S04bsu036_u:1006: parinirvṛtasyāpi jinasya tasya dvātriṃśatiṃ antarakalpa pūrṇām /
S04bsu036_u:1007: saddharma saṃsthāsyati tasmi kāle hitāya lokasya sadevakasya // Saddhp_3.30 //
S04bsu036_u:1009: saddharmi kṣīṇe pratirūpako 'sya dvātriṃśatī antarakalpa sthāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:1010: śarīravaistārika tasya tāyinaḥ susatkṛto naramarutaiśca nityam // Saddhp_3.31 //
S04bsu036_u:1011: etādṛśaḥ so bhagavān bhaviṣyati prahṛṣṭa tvaṃ śārisutā bhavasva /
S04bsu036_u:1012: tvameva so tādṛśako bhaviṣyasi anābhibhūto dvipadānamuttamaḥ // Saddhp_3.32 //
S04bsu036_u:1013_2: saṃmukhaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ svakasvakaiścīvarairbhagavantamabhicchādayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1014: śakraśca devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāṃpatiranyāśca devaputraśatasahasrakoṭyo bhagavantaṃ divyairvastrairabhicchādayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1017: divyāni ca tūryaśatasahasrāṇi dundubhayaścoparyantarīkṣe parāhananti sma /
S04bsu036_u:1018: mahāntaṃ ca puṣpavarṣamabhipravarṣayitvā evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣante sma - pūrvaṃ bhagavatā vārāṇasyāmṛṣipatane mṛgadāve dharmacakraṃ pravartitam /
S04bsu036_u:1019: idaṃ punarbhagavatā adya anuttaraṃ dvitīyaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartitam /
S04bsu036_u:1020: te ca devaputrāstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣanta -
S04bsu036_u:1026: na cāyamīdṛśo dharmaḥ śrutapūrvaḥ kadācana // Saddhp_3.35 //
S04bsu036_u:1028: yathārtho vyākṛto hyeṣa śāriputro viśāradaḥ // Saddhp_3.36 //
S04bsu036_u:1032: ārāgitaśca yadbuddhaḥ prārthanā bhotu bodhaye // Saddhp_3.38 //
S04bsu036_u:1034: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - niṣkāṅkṣo 'smi bhagavan vigatakathaṃkatho bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukhamidamātmano vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu036_u:1035_0: yāni ca imāni bhagavan dvādaśa vaśībhūtaśatāni bhagavatā pūrvaṃ śaikṣabhūmau sthāpitāni
S04bsu036_u:1035_1: evamavavaditāni evamanuśiṣṭānyabhūvan etatparyavasāno me bhikṣavo dharmavinayo yadidaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1036_0: ime ca bhagavan dve bhikṣusahasre śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ sarveṣāmātmadṛṣṭibhavadṛṣṭivibhavadṛṣṭisarvadṛṣṭivivarjitānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:1038: tatsādhu bhagavān bhāṣatāmeṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ kaukṛtyavinodanārtha yathā bhagavannetāścatasraḥ parṣado niṣkāṅkṣā nirvicikitsā bhaveyuḥ //
S04bsu036_u:1039_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nanu te mayā śāriputra pūrvamevākhyātaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1039_2: sattvānāṃ nānādhātvāśayānāmāśayaṃ viditvā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho dharmaṃ deśayati /
S04bsu036_u:1041: api tu khalu punaḥ śāriputra aupamyaṃ te kariṣyāmi asyaivārthasya bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśanārtham /
S04bsu036_u:1044_0: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra iha syāt kasmiṃścideva grāme vā nagare vā nigame vā janapade
S04bsu036_u:1044_1: vā janapadapradeśe vā rāṣṭre vā rājadhānyāṃ vā gṛhapatirjīrṇo vṛddho mahallako 'bhyatītavayo
S04bsu036_u:1045: mahaccāsya niveśanaṃ bhaveducchritaṃ ca vistīrṇaṃ ca cirakṛtaṃ ca jīrṇaṃ ca dvayorvā trayāṇāṃ vā caturṇāṃ vā pañcānāṃ vā prāṇiśatānāmāvāsaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1051: tacca sahasaiva mahātāgniskandhena sarvapārśveṣu sarvāvantaṃ niveśanaṃ pradīptaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1052: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ kumārakāḥ syuḥ pañca vā daśa vā viṃśatirvā /
S04bsu036_u:1054: atha khalu śāriputra sa puruṣastaṃ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ mahātāgniskandhena samantāt
S04bsu036_u:1056: evaṃ cānuvicintayet - pratibalo 'hamanena mahatāgniskandhenāsaṃspṛṣṭo 'paridagdhaḥ kṣiprameva svastinā asmād gṛhādādīptād dvāreṇa nirgantuṃ nirdhāvitum /
S04bsu036_u:1057: api tu ya ime mamaiva putrā bālakāḥ kumārakā asminneva niveśane ādīpte taistaiḥ krīḍanakaiḥ krīḍanti ramanti paricārayanti,
S04bsu036_u:1058: imaṃ cāgāramādīptaṃ na jānanti na budhyante na vidanti na cetayanti nodvegamāpadyante,
S04bsu036_u:1059: saṃtapyamānā apyanena mahatāgniskandhena mahatā ca duḥkhaskandhena spṛṣṭāḥ samānā na duḥkhaṃ manasi kurvanti,
S04bsu036_u:1062: sa ca śāriputra puruṣo balavān bhaved bāhubalikaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1064: yannvahaṃ sarvānimān kumārakānekapiṇḍayitvā utsaṅgenādāya asmād gṛhānnirgamayeyam /
S04bsu036_u:1065: sa punarevamanuvicintayet - idaṃ khalu niveśanamekapraveśaṃ saṃvṛtadvārameva /
S04bsu036_u:1070: iti pratisaṃkhyāya tān kumārakānāmantrayate sma - āgacchata bhavantaḥ kumārakāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1075: atha khalu te kumārakā evaṃ tasya hitakāmasya puruṣasya tadbhāṣitaṃ nāvabudhyante nodvijanti notrasanti na saṃtrasanti na saṃtrāsamāpadyante,
S04bsu036_u:1077: nāpi jānanti na vijānanti kimetadādīptaṃ nāmeti /
S04bsu036_u:1082: atha khalu sa puruṣa evamanuvicintayet - ādīptamidaṃ niveśanaṃ mahatāgniskandhena saṃpradīptam /
S04bsu036_u:1083: mā haivāhaṃ ceme ca kumārakā ihaivānena mahātāgniskandhena anayavyasanamāpatsyāmahe /
S04bsu036_u:1087: teṣāṃ ca kumārakāṇāmanekavidhānyanekāni krīḍanakāni bhaveyurvividhāni ca ramaṇīyakānīṣṭāni kāntāni priyāṇi manaāpāni,
S04bsu036_u:1089: atha khalu sa puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmāśayaṃ jānaṃstān kumārakānetadavocat - yāni tāni kumārakā yuṣmākaṃ krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyakānyāścaryādbhutāni,
S04bsu036_u:1094: tāni ca mayā sarvāṇi bahinirveśanadvāre sthāpitāni yuṣmākaṃ krīḍanahetoḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1096: ahaṃ vo yasya yasya yenārtho yena prayojanaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:1100_0: atha khalu te kumārakāsteṣāṃ krīḍanakānāṃ ramaṇīyakānāmarthāya yathepsitānāṃ yathāsaṃkalpitānāmiṣṭānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:1100_1: kāntānāṃ priyāṇāṃ manaāpānāṃ nāmadheyāni śrutvā tasmādādīptādagārāt kṣipramevārabdhavīryā
S04bsu036_u:1100_2: balavatā javena anyonyamapratīkṣamāṇāḥ kaḥ prathamaṃ kaḥ prathamataramityanyonyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1101: atha sa puruṣaḥ kṣemasvastinā tān kumārakān nirgatān dṛṣṭvā abhayaprāptāniti viditvā ākāśe grāmacatvare upaviṣṭaḥ prītiprāmodyajāto nirupādāno vigatanīvaraṇo 'bhayaprāpto bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1102: atha khalu te kumārakā yena sa pitā tenopasaṃkrāman,
S04bsu036_u:1103: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadeyuḥ - dehi nastāta tāni vividhāni krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyāni /
S04bsu036_u:1105: atha khalu śāriputra sa puruṣasteṣāṃ svakānāṃ putrāṇāṃ vātajavasaṃpannān (Vaidya 53)
S04bsu036_u:1109: tathā hi śāriputra sa puruṣa āḍhyaśca bhavenmahādhanaśca prabhūtakoṣṭhāgāraśca /
S04bsu036_u:1110: sa evaṃ manyeta - alaṃ ma eṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmanyairyānairdattairiti /
S04bsu036_u:1115: samaṃ ca mayaite kumārakāḥ sarve cintayitavyā na viṣamam /
S04bsu036_u:1119: te ca dārakāstasmin samaye teṣu mahāyāneṣvabhiruhya āścaryādbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1120: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra mā haiva tasya puruṣasya mṛṣāvādaḥ syāt,
S04bsu036_u:1121: yena teṣāṃ dārakāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā paścātsarveṣāṃ mahāyānānyeva dattāni,
S04bsu036_u:1125: anenaiva tāvad bhagavan kāraṇena sa puruṣo na mṛṣāvādī bhaved yattena puruṣeṇopāyakauśalyena te dārakāstasmādādīptād gṛhānniṣkāsitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1129: yadyapi tāvad bhagavan sa puruṣasteṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmekarathamapi na dadyāt,
S04bsu036_u:1130: tathāpi tāvad bhagavan sa puruṣo na mṛṣāvādī bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1132: tathā hi bhagavaṃstena puruṣeṇa pūrvameva evamanuvicintitam - upāyakauśalyena ahamimān kumārakāṃstasmānmahato duḥkhaskandhāt parimocayiṣyāmīti /
S04bsu036_u:1133: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa tasya puruṣasya na mṛṣāvādo bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1134: kaḥ punarvādo yattena puruṣeṇa prabhūtakośakoṣṭhāgāramastīti kṛtvā putrapriyatāmeva manyamānena ślāghamānenaikavarṇānyekayānāni dattāni,
S04bsu036_u:1137: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu śāriputra /
S04bsu036_u:1145: sa utpannaḥ samānaḥ paśyati sattvān dahyataḥ pacyamānāṃstapyamānān paritapyamānān jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1146: paribhoganimittaṃ ca kāmahetunidānaṃ ca anekāvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:1147: dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ ca paryeṣṭinidānaṃ parigrahanidānaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ narakatiryagyoniyamalokeṣvanekavidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:1149_0: tatraiva ca duḥkhaskandhe parivartamānāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti notrasanti
S04bsu036_u:1149_1: na saṃtrasanti na saṃtrāsamāpadyante na budhyante na cetayanti nodvijanti na niḥsaraṇaṃ paryeṣante /
S04bsu036_u:1152: tena ca mahatā duḥkhaskandhena abhyāhatā na duḥkhamanasikārasaṃjñāmutpādayanti //
S04bsu036_u:1153: tatra śāriputra tathāgata evaṃ paśyati - ahaṃ khalveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ pitā /
S04bsu036_u:1154: mayā hyete sattvā asmādevaṃrūpānmahato duḥkhaskandhāt parimocayitavyāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1158: tatra śāriputra tathāgata evaṃ paśyati - sacedahaṃ jñānabalo 'smīti kṛtvā ṛddhibalo 'smīti kṛtvā anupāyenaiṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānabalavaiśāradyāni saṃśrāvayeyam,
S04bsu036_u:1161: adhyavasitā hyamī sattvāḥ pañcasu kāmaguṇeṣu traidhātukaratyām /
S04bsu036_u:1165: tatra śāriputra tathāgato yadyathāpi nāma sa puruṣo bāhubalikaḥ sthāpayitvā bāhubalam,
S04bsu036_u:1167: niṣkāsayitvā sa teṣāṃ paścādudārāṇi mahāyānāni dadyāt,
S04bsu036_u:1169: upāyakauśalyajñānenādīptajīrṇapaṭalaśaraṇaniveśanasadṛśāt traidhātukāt sattvānāṃ niṣkāsanahetostrīṇi yānānyupadarśayati yadut śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānamiti /
S04bsu036_u:1171: evaṃ caiṣāṃ vadati - mā bhavanto 'sminnādīptāgārasadṛśe traidhātuke 'bhiramadhvaṃ hīneṣu rūpaśabdagandharasasparśeṣu /
S04bsu036_u:1172: atra hi yūyaṃ traidhātuke 'bhiratāḥ pañcakāmaguṇasahagatayā tṛṣṇayā dahyatha tapyatha paritapyatha /
S04bsu036_u:1174: trīṇi yānānyanuprāpsyatha yadidaṃ śrāvakayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānamiti /
S04bsu036_u:1178: evaṃ caitāṃllobhayāmi - etāni bhoḥ sattvā yāni āryāṇi ca āryapraśastāni ca mahāramaṇīyakasamanvāgatāni ca /
S04bsu036_u:1183: tatra śāriputra ye sattvāḥ paṇḍitajātīyā bhavanti,
S04bsu036_u:1188: tadyathāpi nāma tasmādādīptādagārādanyatare dārakā mṛgarathamākāṅkṣamāṇā nirdhāvitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1189: anye sattvā anācāryakaṃ jñānaṃ damaśamathamākāṅkṣamāṇā ātmaparinirvāṇahetorhetupratyayānubodhāya tathāgataśāsane 'bhiyujyante,
S04bsu036_u:1191: tadyathāpi nāma tasmādādīptādagārādanyatare dārakā ajarathamāṅkṣamāṇā nirdhāvitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1192_0: apare punaḥ sattvāḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ buddhajñānaṃ svayaṃbhūjñānamanācāryakaṃ jñānamākāṅkṣamāṇā
S04bsu036_u:1192_1: bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya
S04bsu036_u:1196_0: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra sa puruṣastān kumārakāṃstasmādādīptādagārānnirdhāvitān
S04bsu036_u:1196_1: dṛṣṭvā kṣemasvastibhyāṃ parimuktānabhayaprāptāniti viditvā ātmānaṃ ca mahādhanaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1197_0: evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho yadā paśyati - anekāḥ sattvakoṭīstraidhātukāt
S04bsu036_u:1199_0: tānetān śāriputra tasmin samaye tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ prabhūto mahājñānabalavaiśāradyakośa
S04bsu036_u:1199_1: iti viditvā sarve caite mamaiva putrā iti jñātvā buddhayānenaiva tān sattvān parinirvāpayati /
S04bsu036_u:1200: na ca kasyacit sattvasya pratyātmikaṃ parinirvāṇaṃ vadati /
S04bsu036_u:1203: ye cāpi te śāriputra sattvāstraidhātukāt parimuktā bhavanti,
S04bsu036_u:1204: teṣāṃ tathāgato dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīrāryāṇi paramasukhāni krīḍanakāni ramaṇīyakāni dadāti,
S04bsu036_u:1206: tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra tasya puruṣasya na mṛṣāvādo bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:1207_0: yena trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā teṣāṃ kumārakāṇāmekameva mahāyānaṃ sarveṣāṃ dattaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1207_1: saptaratnamayaṃ sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitamekavarṇameva udārayānameva sarveṣāmagrayānameva dattaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1208: evameva śāriputra tathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho na mṛṣāvādī bhavati,
S04bsu036_u:1209: yena pūrvamupāyakauśalyena trīṇi yānānyupadarśayitvā paścānmahāyānenaiva sattvān parinirvāpayati /
S04bsu036_u:1211: tathāgato hi śāriputra prabhūtajñānabalavaiśāradyakośakoṣṭhāgārasamanvāgataḥ pratibalaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvajñajñānasahagataṃ (Vaidya 56)
S04bsu036_u:1215: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:1216: yathā hi puruṣasya bhavedagāraṃ jīrṇaṃ mahantaṃ ca sudurbalaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:1217: viśīrṇa prāsādu tathā bhaveta stambhāśca mūleṣu bhaveyu pūtikāḥ // Saddhp_3.39 //
S04bsu036_u:1218: gavākṣaharmyā galitaikadeśā viśīrṇa kuḍayaṃ kaṭalepanaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:1219: jīrṇu pravṛddhoddhṛtavedikaṃ ca tṛṇacchadaṃ sarvata opatantam // Saddhp_3.40 //
S04bsu036_u:1220: śatāna pañcāna anūnakānāṃ āvāsu so tatra bhaveta prāṇinām /
S04bsu036_u:1221: bahūni cā niṣkuṭasaṃkaṭāni uccārapūrṇāni jugupsitāni // Saddhp_3.41 //
S04bsu036_u:1222: gopānasī vigalita tatra sarvā kuḍayāśca bhittīśca tathaiva srastāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1223: gṛdhrāṇa koṭyo nivasanti tatra pārāvatolūka tathānyapakṣiṇaḥ // Saddhp_3.42 //
S04bsu036_u:1224: āśīviṣā dāruṇa tatra santi deśapradeśeṣu mahāviṣogrāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1225: vicitrikā vṛścikamūṣikāśca etāna āvāsu suduṣṭaprāṇinām // Saddhp_3.43 //
S04bsu036_u:1226: deśe ca deśe amanuṣya bhūyo uccāraprasrāvavināśitaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:1227: kṛmikīṭakhadyotakapūritaṃ ca śvabhiḥ śṛgālaiśca nināditaṃ ca // Saddhp_3.44 //

S04bsu036_u:1409: kṣipitva bodhīmimamevarūpāmupaśānti tasyo na kadāci bhoti // Saddhp_3.129 //
S04bsu036_u:1410: sahasra nekā nayutāṃśca bhūyaḥ kalpāna koṭyo yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1411: jaḍātmabhāvo vikalaśca bhoti kṣipitva sūtraṃ imu pāpakaṃ phalam // Saddhp_3.130 //
S04bsu036_u:1412: udyānabhūmī narako 'sya bhoti niveśanaṃ tasya apāyabhūmiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1413: kharasūkarā kroṣṭuka bhūmisūcakāḥ pratiṣṭhitasyeha bhavanti nityam // Saddhp_3.131 //
S04bsu036_u:1415: parapreṣya so bhoti daridra nityaṃ tatkāli tasyābharaṇānimāni // Saddhp_3.132 //
S04bsu036_u:1416: vastrāṇi co vyādhayu bhonti tasya vraṇāna koṭīnayutāśca kāye /
S04bsu036_u:1417: vicarcikā kaṇḍu tathaiva pāmā kuṣṭhaṃ kilāsaṃ tatha āmagandhaḥ // Saddhp_3.133 //
S04bsu036_u:1418: satkāyadṛṣṭiśca ghanāsya bhoti udīryate krodhabalaṃ ca tasya /
S04bsu036_u:1419: saṃrāgu tasyātibhṛśaṃ ca bhoti tiryāṇa yonīṣu ca so sadā ramī // Saddhp_3.134 //
S04bsu036_u:1420: sacedahaṃ śārisutādya tasya paripūrṇakalpaṃ pravadeya doṣān /
S04bsu036_u:1421: yo hī mamā etu kṣipeta sūtraṃ paryantu doṣāṇa na śakya gantum // Saddhp_3.135 //
S04bsu036_u:1423: saṃpaśyamāno idameva cārthaṃ tvāṃ saṃdiśāmī ahu śāriputra /
S04bsu036_u:1424: mā haiva tvaṃ bālajanasya agrato bhāṣiṣyase sūtramimevarūpam // Saddhp_3.136 //
S04bsu036_u:1425: ye tū iha vyakta bahuśrutāśca smṛtimanta ye paṇḍita jñānavantaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1426: ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhiṃ tān śrāvayestvaṃ paramārthametat // Saddhp_3.137 //
S04bsu036_u:1427: dṛṣṭāśca yehī bahubuddhakoṭyaḥ kuśalaṃ ca yai ropitamaprameyam /
S04bsu036_u:1428: adhyāśayāścā dṛḍha yeṣa co syāttān śrāvayestvaṃ paramārthametat // Saddhp_3.138 //
S04bsu036_u:1429: ye vīryavantaḥ sada maitracittā bhāventi maitrīmiha dīrgharātram /
S04bsu036_u:1430: utsṛṣṭakāyā tatha jīvite ca teṣāmidaṃ sūtra bhaṇeḥ samakṣam // Saddhp_3.139 //
S04bsu036_u:1431: anyonyasaṃkalpa sagauravāśca teṣāṃ ca bālehi na saṃstavo 'sti /
S04bsu036_u:1432: ye cāpi tuṣṭā girikandareṣu tān śrāvayestvaṃ ida sūtra bhadrakam // Saddhp_3.140 //
S04bsu036_u:1434: yānīdṛśān paśyasi buddhaputrāṃsteṣāmidaṃ sūtra prakāśayesi // Saddhp_3.141 //
S04bsu036_u:1436: paśyesi yānīdṛśa buddhaputrāṃsteṣāgrataḥ sūtramidaṃ vadesi // Saddhp_3.142 //
S04bsu036_u:1437: akrodhanā ye sada ārjavāśca kṛpāsamanvāgata sarvaprāṇiṣu /
S04bsu036_u:1439: sagauravā ye sugatasya antike teṣāgrataḥ sūtramidaṃ vadesi // Saddhp_3.143 //
S04bsu036_u:1440: yo dharmu bhāṣe pariṣāya madhye asaṅgaprāpto vadi yuktamānasaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1442: mūrdhnāñjaliṃ yaśca karoti baddhvā sarvajñabhāvaṃ parimārgamāṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1443: daśo diśo yo 'pi ca caṃkrameta subhāṣitaṃ bhikṣu gaveṣamāṇaḥ // Saddhp_3.145 //
S04bsu036_u:1444: vaipulyasūtrāṇi ca dhārayeta na cāsya rucyanti kadācidanye /
S04bsu036_u:1445: ekāṃ pi gāthāṃ na ca dhāraye 'nyatastaṃ śrāvayestvaṃ varasūtrametat // Saddhp_3.146 //
S04bsu036_u:1446: tathāgatasyo yatha dhātu dhārayettathaiva yo mārgati koci taṃ naraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1447: emeva yo mārgati sūtramīdṛśaṃ labhitva yo mūrdhani dhārayeta // Saddhp_3.147 //
S04bsu036_u:1448: anyeṣu sūtreṣu na kāci cintā lokāyatairanyataraiśca śāstraiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1449: bālāna etādṛśa bhonti gocarāstāṃstvaṃ vivarjitva prakāśayeridam // Saddhp_3.148 //
S04bsu036_u:1450: pūrṇaṃ pi kalpaṃ ahu śāriputra vadeyamākāra sahasrakoṭyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1451: ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhiṃ teṣāgrataḥ sūtramidaṃ vadesi // Saddhp_3.149 //
S04bsu036_u:1456_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmāṃśca mahākātyāyanaḥ āyuṣmāṃśca mahākāśyapaḥ āyuṣmāṃśca
S04bsu036_u:1456_1: mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ imamevaṃrūpamaśrutapūrvaṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā bhagavato 'ntikāt saṃmukhamāyuṣmataśca
S04bsu036_u:1456_2: śāriputrasya vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā
S04bsu036_u:1457_0: upasaṃkramya ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānuṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena
S04bsu036_u:1457_2: praṇatakāyāstasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantametadavocan - vayaṃ hi bhagavan jīrṇā vṛddhā
S04bsu036_u:1457_3: mahallakā asmin bhikṣusaṃghe sthavirasaṃmatā jarājīrṇībhūtā nirvāṇaprāptāḥ sma iti
S04bsu036_u:1461: vayaṃ ca tasyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāṃ pratyupasthitā bhavāmaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1462: tadāpyasmākaṃ bhagavan ciraṃ niṣaṇṇānāṃ bhagavantaṃ ciraṃ paryupāsitānāmaṅgapratyaṅgāni duḥkhanti,
S04bsu036_u:1464: tato vayaṃ bhagavan bhagavato dharmaṃ deśayamānasya śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitaṃ sarvamāviṣkurmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1465: nāsmābhireṣu buddhadharmeṣu buddhakṣetravyūheṣu vā bodhisattvavikrīḍiteṣu vā tathāgatavikrīḍiteṣu vā spṛhotpāditā /
S04bsu036_u:1469: tato bhagavan asmābhirapyanye bodhisattvā avavaditā abhūvannanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu036_u:1472: te vayaṃ bhagavannetarhi bhagavato 'ntikācchrāvakāṇāmapi vyākaraṇamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhavatīti śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāptā mahālābhaprāptāḥ smaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1473: bhagavannadya sahasaivemamevaṃrūpamaśrutapūrvaṃ tathāgataghoṣaṃ śrutvā mahāratnapratilabdhāśca smaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1475: bhagavan amārgitamaparyeṣṭamacintitamaprārthitaṃ cāsmābhirbhagavannidamevaṃ rūpaṃ mahāratnaṃ pratilabdham /
S04bsu036_u:1478: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścideva puruṣaḥ piturantikādapakrāmet /
S04bsu036_u:1480: sa tatra bahūni varṣāṇi vipravased viṃśatiṃ vā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā /
S04bsu036_u:1481: atha sa bhagavan mahān puruṣo bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1483: sa ca vṛttiṃ paryeṣamāṇa āhāracīvarahetordiśo vidiśaḥ prakāman anyataraṃ janapadapradeśaṃ gacchet /
S04bsu036_u:1484: tasya ca sa pitā anyatamaṃ janapadaṃ prakrāntaḥ syāt /
S04bsu036_u:1495: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣasya pitā bahudhanahiraṇyakośakoṣṭhāgārastasmin nagare vasamānastaṃ pañcāśadvarṣanaṣṭaṃ putraṃ satatasamitamanusmaret /
S04bsu036_u:1497: evaṃ ca cintayet - ahamasmi jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1502: sa taṃ punaḥ punaḥ putramanusmaret - aho nāmāhaṃ nirvṛtiprāpto bhaveyaṃ yadi me sa putra imaṃ dhanaskandhaṃ paribhuñjīta //
S04bsu036_u:1503_0: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣa āhāracīvaraṃ paryeṣamāṇo 'nupūrveṇa yena tasya
S04bsu036_u:1504_0: atha khalu bhagavan sa tasya daridrapuruṣasya pitā svake niveśanadvāre mahatyā brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviṭśūdrapariṣadā
S04bsu036_u:1504_1: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto mahāsiṃhāsane sapādapīṭhe suvarṇarūpyapratimaṇḍite upaviṣṭo hiraṇyakoṭīśatasahasrairvyavahāraṃ
S04bsu036_u:1504_2: kurvan vālavyajanena vījyamāno vitatavitāne pṛthivīpradeśe muktakusumābhikīrṇe ratnadāmābhipralambite
S04bsu036_u:1505: adrākṣīt sa bhagavan daridrapuruṣastaṃ svakaṃ pitaraṃ svake niveśanadvāre evaṃrūpayā ṛdhyā upaviṣṭaṃ mahatā janakāyena parivṛtaṃ gṛhapatikṛtyaṃ kurvāṇam /
S04bsu036_u:1506: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhītastrastaḥ saṃvignaḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpajātaḥ udvignamānasaḥ evamanuvicintayāmāsa - sahasaivāyaṃ mayā rājā vā rājamātro vā āsāditaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1513: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣo duḥkhaparaṃparāmanasikārabhayabhītastvaramāṇaḥ prakrāmet palāyet,
S04bsu036_u:1515: atha khalu bhagavan sa āḍhyaḥ puruṣaḥ svake niveśanadvāre siṃhāsane upaviṣṭastaṃ svakaṃ putraṃ sahadarśanenaiva pratyabhijānīyāt /
S04bsu036_u:1516: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭa udagra āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:1517: evaṃ ca cintayet - āścaryaṃ yāvad yatra hi nāma asya mahato hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgārasya paribhoktā upalabdhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1521: atha khalu bhagavan sa puruṣaḥ putratṛṣṇāsaṃpīḍitastasmin kṣaṇalavamuhūrte javanān puruṣān saṃpreṣayet - gacchata mārṣā etaṃ puruṣaṃ śīghramānayadhvam /
S04bsu036_u:1522: atha khalu bhagavaṃste puruṣāḥ rsava eva javena pradhāvitāstaṃ daridrapuruṣamadhyālambeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1523: atha khalu daridrapuruṣastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhītastrastaḥ saṃvignaḥ saṃhṛṣṭaromakūpajātaḥ udvigramānaso dāruṇamārtasvaraṃ muñcedāraved viravet /
S04bsu036_u:1525: atha khalu te puruṣā balātkāreṇa taṃ (Vaidya 73)
S04bsu036_u:1527: atha khalu sa daridrapuruṣo bhītastrastaḥ saṃvigna udvignamānasa evaṃ ca cintayet - mā tāvadahaṃ vadhyo daṇḍayo bhaveyam /
S04bsu036_u:1532: sa tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - mā bhavanta etaṃ puruṣamānayantviti /
S04bsu036_u:1533: tamenaṃ śītalena vāriṇā parisiñcitvā na bhūya ālapet /
S04bsu036_u:1537: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatirupāyakauśalyena na kasyacidācakṣet - mamaiṣa putra iti /
S04bsu036_u:1538: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatiranyataraṃ puruṣamāmantrayet - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
S04bsu036_u:1539: enaṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadasva - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi /
S04bsu036_u:1541: evaṃ vadati sa puruṣastasmai pratiśrutya yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet /
S04bsu036_u:1542: upasaṃkramya taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi /
S04bsu036_u:1544: atha khalu sa daridrapuruṣa idaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1545: sa utthāya tasmāt pṛthivīpradeśādyena daridravīthī tenopasaṃkrāmedāhāracīvaraparyeṣṭihetoḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1547: sa tatra dvau puruṣau prayojayet durvarṇāvalpaujaskau - gacchatāṃ bhavantau yo 'sau puruṣa ihāgato 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:1548: taṃ yuvāṃ dviguṇayā divasamudrayā ātmavacanenaiva bharayitveha mama niveśane karma kārāpayethām /
S04bsu036_u:1549: sacet sa evaṃ vadet - kiṃ karma kartavyamiti,
S04bsu036_u:1550: sa yuvābhyāmevaṃ vaktavyaḥ - saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayitavyaṃ sahāvābhyāmiti /
S04bsu036_u:1551: atha tau puruṣau taṃ daridrapuruṣaṃ paryeṣayitvā tayā kriyayā saṃpādayetām /
S04bsu036_u:1552: atha khalu tau dvau puruṣau sa ca daridrapuruṣo vetanaṃ gṛhītvā tasya mahādhanasya puruṣasyāntikāttasminneva niveśane saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1553: tasyaiva ca mahādhanasya puruṣasya gṛhaparisare kaṭapalikuñcikāyāṃ vāsaṃ kalpayeyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1554: sa cāḍhyaḥ puruṣo gavākṣavātāyanena taṃ svakaṃ putraṃ paśyet saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayamānam /
S04bsu036_u:1556: atha khalu sa gṛhapatiḥ svakānniveśanādavatīrya apanayitvā mālyābharaṇani,
S04bsu036_u:1559: dakṣiṇena pāṇinā piṭakaṃ parigṛhya pāṃsunā svagātraṃ dūṣayitvā dūrata eva saṃbhāṣamāṇo yena sa daridrapuruṣastenopasaṃkrāmet /
S04bsu036_u:1564: enaṃ vadet - ihaiva tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa karma kuruṣva /
S04bsu036_u:1567: yena yena ca te kārya bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:1569: yadi vā kuṇḍamūlyena yadi vā kuṇḍikāmūlyena yadi vā sthālikāmūlyena yadi vā kāṣṭhamūlyena yadi vā lavaṇamūlyena yadi vā bhojanena yadi vā prāvaraṇena /
S04bsu036_u:1574: yena yena te bhoḥ puruṣa kāryamevaṃrūpeṇa pariṣkāreṇa,
S04bsu036_u:1581: mama ca tvayā bahu karma kṛtamimaṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhayatā /
S04bsu036_u:1582: na ca tvayā bhoḥ puruṣa atra karma kurvatā śāṭhayaṃ vā vakratā vā kauṭilyaṃ vā māno vā mrakṣo vā kṛtapūrvaḥ, karoṣi vā /
S04bsu036_u:1583: sarvathā te bhoḥ puruṣa na samanupaśyāmyekamapi pāpakarma,
S04bsu036_u:1584: yathaiṣāmanyeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ karma kurvatāmime doṣāḥ saṃvidyante /
S04bsu036_u:1587: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistasya daridrapuruṣasya putra iti nāma kuryāt /
S04bsu036_u:1589: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa sa gṛhapatiḥ putrakāmatṛṣito viṃśativarṣāṇi taṃ putraṃ saṃkāradhānaṃ śodhāpayet /
S04bsu036_u:1590: atha viṃśatervarṣāṇāmatyayena sa daridrapuruṣastasya gṛhapaterniveśane viśrabdho bhavenniṣkramaṇapraveśe,
S04bsu036_u:1592: atha khalu bhagavaṃstasya gṛhapaterglānyaṃ pratyupasthitaṃ bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1593: sa maraṇakālasamayaṃ ca ātmanaḥ pratyupasthitaṃ samanupaśyet /
S04bsu036_u:1594: sa taṃ daridrapuruṣamevaṃ vadet - āgaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa /
S04bsu036_u:1597: icchāmyetaṃ yasya dātavyaṃ yataśca grahītavyaṃ yacca nidhātavyaṃ bhavet,
S04bsu036_u:1602: mā ca me tvaṃ kiṃcidato vipraṇāśayiṣyasi //
S04bsu036_u:1603: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣo 'nena paryāyeṇa tacca tasya gṛhapateḥ prabhūtaṃ hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ saṃjānīyāt /
S04bsu036_u:1609_0: atha khalu bhagavan sa gṛhapatistaṃ putraṃ śaktaṃ paripālakaṃ paripakvaṃ viditvā
S04bsu036_u:1609_1: avamarditacittamudārasaṃjñayā ca paurvikayā daridracintayā ārtīyantaṃ jehrīyamāṇaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1609_2: jugupsamānaṃ viditvā maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite taṃ daridrapuruṣamānāyya mahato
S04bsu036_u:1609_3: jñātisaṃghasyopanāmayitvā rājño vā rājamātrasya vā purato naigamajānapadānāṃ ca saṃmukhamevaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1610: ayaṃ mama putra auraso mayaiva janitaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1622: atha khalu bhagavan sa daridrapuruṣastasmin samaye imamevaṃrūpaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā āścaryādbhutaprāpto bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:1623: evaṃ ca vicintayet - sahasaiva mayedameva tāvad hiraṇyasuvarṇadhanadhānyakośakoṣṭhāgāraṃ pratilabdhamiti //
S04bsu036_u:1626: tathāgataśca asmākamevaṃ vadati - putrā mama yūyamiti,
S04bsu036_u:1632: tato vayaṃ bhagavatā bahūn dharmān pratyavarān saṃkāradhānasadṛśānanuvicintayitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1634: nirvāṇamātraṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan divasamudrāmiva paryeṣamāṇā mārgāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1635: tena ca vayaṃ bhagavan nirvāṇena pratilabdhena tuṣṭā bhavāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1636: bahu ca labdhamiti manyāmahe tathāgatasyāntikāt eṣu dharmeṣvabhiyuktā ghaṭitvā vyāyamitvā /
S04bsu036_u:1644: tata evaṃ jānīma - etadevāsmākaṃ bahukaraṃ yadvayaṃ tathāgatasyāntikāddivasamudrāmiva nirvāṇaṃ pratilabhāmahe /
S04bsu036_u:1645: te vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatajñānadarśanamārabhya udārāṃ dharmadeśanāṃ kurmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1650: tacca vayaṃ na jānīmo na budhyāmahe yadidaṃ bhagavatā etarhi kathitam - yathā vayaṃ bhagavato bhūtāḥ putrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1653: yathāpi nāma vayaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtāḥ putrāḥ iti,
S04bsu036_u:1657: vayaṃ punarbhagavatā dve kārye kārāpitāḥ - bodhisattvānāṃ cāgrato hīnādhimuktikā ityuktāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:1662: atha khalvāyuṣmān mahākāśyapastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣat -
S04bsu036_u:1663: āścaryabhūtāḥ sma tathādbhutāśca audbilyaprāptāḥ sma śruṇitva ghoṣam /
S04bsu036_u:1664: sahasaiva asmābhirayaṃ tathādya manojñaghoṣaḥ śrutu nāyakasya // Saddhp_4.1 //
S04bsu036_u:1667: na cintito nāpi kadāci prārthitastaṃ śrutva āścaryagatāḥ sma sarve // Saddhp_4.2 //
S04bsu036_u:1668: yathāpi bālaḥ puruṣo bhaveta utplāvito bālajanena santaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1669: pituḥ sakāśātu apakrameta anyaṃ ca deśaṃ vraji so sudūram // Saddhp_4.3 //
S04bsu036_u:1670: pitā ca taṃ śocati tasmi kāle palāyitaṃ jñātva svakaṃ hi putram /
S04bsu036_u:1671: śocantu so digvidiśāsu añce varṣāṇi pañcāśadanūnakāni // Saddhp_4.4 //
S04bsu036_u:1672: tathā ca so putra gaveṣamāṇo anyaṃ mahantaṃ nagaraṃ hi gatvā /
S04bsu036_u:1673: niveśanaṃ māpiya tatra tiṣṭhet samarpito kāmugaṇehi pañcabhiḥ // Saddhp_4.5 //
S04bsu036_u:1674: bahuṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇarūpyaṃ dhānyaṃ dhanaṃ śaṅkhaśilāpravālam /
S04bsu036_u:1675: hastī ca aśvāśca padātayaśca gāvaḥ paśūścaiva tathaiḍakāśca // Saddhp_4.6 //
S04bsu036_u:1676: prayoga āyoga tathaiva kṣetrā dāsī ca dāsā bahu preṣyavargaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:1678: kṛtāñjalī tasya bhavanti nāgarā grāmeṣu ye cāpi vasanti grāmiṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1679: bahuvāṇijāstasya vrajanti antike bahūhi kāryehi kṛtādhikārāḥ // Saddhp_4.8 //
S04bsu036_u:1680: etādṛśo ṛddhimato naraḥ syājjīrṇaśca vṛddhaśca mahallakaśca /
S04bsu036_u:1681: sa putraśokaṃ anucintayantaḥ kṣapeya rātriṃdiva nityakālam // Saddhp_4.9 //
S04bsu036_u:1683: sa tādṛśo durmati mahya putraḥ pañcāśa varṣāṇi tadā palānakaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:1685: so cāpi bālo tada tasya putro daridrakaḥ kṛpaṇaku nityakālam /

S04bsu036_u:1687: paryeṣamāṇo 'pi kadāci kiṃcillabheta kiṃcit puna naiva kiṃcit /

S04bsu036_u:1689: so ca vrajettaṃ nagaraṃ yahiṃ pitā anupūrvaśo tatra gato bhaveta /
S04bsu036_u:1690: bhaktaṃ ca colaṃ ca gaveṣamāṇo niveśanaṃ yatra pituḥ svakasya // Saddhp_4.13 //
S04bsu036_u:1691: so cāpi āḍhyaḥ puruṣo mahādhano dvārasmi siṃhāsani saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1693: āpto janaścāsya samantataḥ sthito dhanaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca gaṇenti kecit /
S04bsu036_u:1694: kecittu lekhānapi lekhayanti kecit prayogaṃ ca prayojayanti // Saddhp_4.15 //
S04bsu036_u:1695: so cā daridro tahi etu dṛṣṭvā vibhūṣitaṃ gṛhapatino niveśanam /
S04bsu036_u:1696: kahiṃ nu adya ahamatra āgato rājā ayaṃ bheṣyati rājamātraḥ // Saddhp_4.16 //
S04bsu036_u:1697: mā dāni doṣaṃ pi labheyamatra gṛhṇitva veṣṭiṃ pi ca kārayeyam /
S04bsu036_u:1699: anucintayantaḥ sa palāyate naro daridravīthīṃ paripṛcchamānaḥ // Saddhp_4.17 //
S04bsu036_u:1700: so cā dhanī taṃ svaku putra dṛṣṭvā siṃhāsanasthaśca bhavet prahṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1701: sa dūtakān preṣayi tasya antike ānetha etaṃ puruṣaṃ daridram // Saddhp_4.18 //
S04bsu036_u:1702: samanantaraṃ tehi gṛhītu so naro gṛhītamātro 'tha ca mūrccha gacchet /
S04bsu036_u:1703: dhrūvaṃ khu mahyaṃ vadhakā upasthitāḥ kiṃ mahya colenatha bhojanena vā // Saddhp_4.19 //
S04bsu036_u:1704: dṛṣṭvā ca so paṇḍitu taṃ mahādhanī hīnādhimukto ayu bāla durmatiḥ /

S04bsu036_u:1706: puruṣāṃśca so tatra prayojayeta vaṅkāśca ye kāṇaka kuṇṭhakāśca /
S04bsu036_u:1707: kucelakāḥ kṛṣṇaka hīnasattvāḥ paryeṣathā taṃ naru karmakārakam // Saddhp_4.21 //
S04bsu036_u:1709: taṃ śodhanārthāya karohi karma dviguṇaṃ ca te vetanakaṃ pradāsye // Saddhp_4.22 //
S04bsu036_u:1710: etādṛśaṃ ghoṣa śruṇitva so naro āgatya saṃśodhayi taṃ pradeśam /
S04bsu036_u:1711: tatraiva so āvasathaṃ ca kuryānniveśanasyopalikuñcike 'smin // Saddhp_4.23 //
S04bsu036_u:1712: so cā dhanī taṃ puruṣaṃ nirīkṣed gavākṣaolokanake 'pi nityam /
S04bsu036_u:1713: hīnādhimukto ayu mahya putraḥ saṃkāradhānaṃ śucikaṃ karoti // Saddhp_4.24 //
S04bsu036_u:1715: sa otaritvā piṭakaṃ gṛhītvā malināni vastrāṇi ca prāvaritvā /
S04bsu036_u:1716: upasaṃkramettasya narasya antike avabhartsayanto na karotha karma // Saddhp_4.25 //
S04bsu036_u:1717: dviguṇaṃ ca te vetanakaṃ dadāmi dviguṇāṃ ca bhūyastatha pādamrakṣaṇam /
S04bsu036_u:1718: saloṇabhaktaṃ ca dadāmi tubhya śākaṃ ca śāṭiṃ ca punardadāmi // Saddhp_4.26 //
S04bsu036_u:1719: evaṃ ca taṃ bhartsiya tasmi kāle saṃśleṣayettaṃ punareva paṇḍitaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:1721: sa stokastokaṃ ca gṛhaṃ praveśayet karmaṃ ca kārāpayi taṃ manuṣyam /

S04bsu036_u:1725: bahirdhā so tasya niveśanasya kuṭikāya eko vasamānu bālaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1726: daridracintāmanucintayeta na me 'sti etādṛśa bhoga kecit // Saddhp_4.30 //
S04bsu036_u:1727: jñātvā ca so tasya imevarūpamudārasaṃjñābhigato mi putraḥ /

S04bsu036_u:1731: uvāca evaṃ pariṣāya madhye putro mamāyaṃ cira vipranaṣṭakaḥ // Saddhp_4.32 //
S04bsu036_u:1732: pañcāśa varṣāṇi supūrṇakāni anye ca 'to viṃśatiye mi dṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1733: amukātu nagarātu mamaiṣa naṣṭo ahaṃ ca mārganta ihaivamāgataḥ // Saddhp_4.33 //
S04bsu036_u:1734: sarvasya dravyasya ayaṃ prabhurme etasya niryātayi sarvaśeṣataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1735: karotu kāryaṃ ca piturdhanena sarvaṃ kuṭumbaṃ ca dadāmi etat // Saddhp_4.34 //
S04bsu036_u:1737: hīnādhimuktiṃ ca pituśca tān guṇāṃllabdhvā kuṭumbaṃ sukhito 'smi adya // Saddhp_4.35 //
S04bsu036_u:1739: na śrāvitaṃ buddha bhaviṣyatheti yūyaṃ kila śrāvaka mahya putrāḥ // Saddhp_4.36 //
S04bsu036_u:1740: asmāṃśca adhyeṣati lokanātho ye prasthitā uttamamagrabodhim /

S04bsu036_u:1742: vayaṃ ca teṣāṃ sugatena preṣitā bahubodhisattvāna mahābalānām /

S04bsu036_u:1744: śrutvā ca asmāku jinasya putrā bodhāya bhāventi sumārgamagryam /

S04bsu036_u:1747: etādṛśaṃ karma karoma tāyinaḥ saṃrakṣamāṇā ima dharmakośam /
S04bsu036_u:1748: prakāśayantaśca jinātmajānāṃ vaiśvāsikastasya yathā naraḥ saḥ // Saddhp_4.40 //
S04bsu036_u:1750: na caiva prārthema jinasya jñānaṃ jinasya jñānaṃ ca prakāśayāmaḥ // Saddhp_4.41 //
S04bsu036_u:1751: pratyātmikīṃ nirvṛti kalpayāma etāvatā jñānamidaṃ na bhūyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1752: nāsmāka harṣo 'pi kadācia bhoti kṣetreṣu buddhāna śruṇitva vyūhān // Saddhp_4.42 //
S04bsu036_u:1754: na cātra kaścidbhavatīha dharmo evaṃ tu cintetva na bhoti śraddhā // Saddhp_4.43 //
S04bsu036_u:1755: suniḥspṛhā smā vaya dīrgharātraṃ bauddhasya jñānasya anuttarasya /

S04bsu036_u:1758: parimukta traidhātukaduḥkhapīḍitāḥ kṛtaṃ ca asmābhi jinasya śāsanam // Saddhp_4.45 //
S04bsu036_u:1759: yaṃ hi prakāśema jinātmajānāṃ ye prasthitā bhonti ihāgrabodhau /
S04bsu036_u:1760: teṣāṃ ca yatkiṃci vadāma dharmaṃ spṛha tatra asmāka na jātu bhoti // Saddhp_4.46 //
S04bsu036_u:1762: na bhāṣate bhūtapadārthasaṃdhiṃ adhimuktimasmāku gaveṣamāṇaḥ // Saddhp_4.47 //
S04bsu036_u:1764: upāyakauśalya yathaiva tasya mahādhanasya puruṣasya kāle /

S04bsu036_u:1767: hīnādhimuktān damayantu putrān dametva ca jñānamidaṃ dadāti // Saddhp_4.49 //
S04bsu036_u:1768: āścaryaprāptāḥ sahasā sma adya yathā daridro labhiyāna vittam /

S04bsu036_u:1772: yad brahmacaryaṃ paramaṃ viśuddhaṃ niṣevitaṃ śāsani nāyakasya /
S04bsu036_u:1773: tasyo viśiṣṭaṃ phalamadya labdhaṃ śāntaṃ udāraṃ ca anāsravaṃ ca // Saddhp_4.52 //
S04bsu036_u:1774: adyo vayaṃ śrāvakabhūta nātha saṃśrāvayiṣyāmatha cāgrabodhim /

S04bsu036_u:1776: arhantabhūtā vayamadya nātha arhāmahe pūja sadevakātaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:1778: ko nāma śaktaḥ pratikartu tubhyamudyuktarūpo bahukalpakoṭyaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:1781: hastehi pādehi śireṇa cāpi pratipriyaṃ duṣkarakaṃ hi kartum /

S04bsu036_u:1784: vihāra kārāpayi candanāmayān saṃstīrya co dūṣyayugehi dadyāt // Saddhp_4.57 //
S04bsu036_u:1785: gilānabhaiṣajya bahuprakāraṃ pūjārtha dadyāt sugatasya nityam /

S04bsu036_u:1788: buddhā mahārāja anāsravā jinā sahanti bālāna imīdṛśāni // Saddhp_4.59 //
S04bsu036_u:1790: dharmeśvaro īśvaru sarvaloke maheśvaro lokavināyakendraḥ // Saddhp_4.60 //

S04bsu036_u:1799: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ mahākāśyapaṃ tāṃścānyān sthavirān mahāśrāvakānāmantrayāmāsa - sādhu sādhu mahākāśyapa /
S04bsu036_u:1800: sādhu khalu punaryuṣmākaṃ kāśyapa yadyūyaṃ tathāgatasya bhūtān guṇavarṇān bhāṣadhve /

S04bsu036_u:1813_1: nānāvarṇā nānāprakārā oṣadhigrāmā nānānāmadheyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ jātāḥ parvatagirikandareṣu vā /

S04bsu036_u:1822: te ca pṛthak pṛthagū nānānāmadheyāni pratilabhante /
S04bsu036_u:1823: ekadharaṇīpratiṣṭhitāśca te sarve oṣadhigrāmā bījagrāmā ekarasatoyābhiṣyanditāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:1824: evameva kāśyapa tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpadyate /

S04bsu036_u:1827: tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa mahāmeghaḥ sarvāvatīṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātumavacchādayati,
S04bsu036_u:1828: evameva kāśyapa tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya purata evaṃ śabdamudīrayati,
S04bsu036_u:1829: ghoṣamanuśrāvayati - tathāgato 'smi bhavanto devamanuṣyāḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ,

S04bsu036_u:1837: tatra kāśyapa bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi tathāgatasya dharmaśravaṇāyopasaṃkrāmanti /
S04bsu036_u:1840: tāṃ tāṃ dharmakathāṃ kathayati bahvīṃ vicitrāṃ harṣaṇīyāṃ paritoṣaṇīyāṃ prāmodyakaraṇīyāṃ hitasukhasaṃvartanakaraṇīyām / yayā
S04bsu036_u:1841: kathaya te sattvāḥ dṛṣṭa eva dharme sukhitā bhavanti,
S04bsu036_u:1845: śrutvā ca taṃ dharmaṃ vigatanīvaraṇā bhavanti /
S04bsu036_u:1846: anupūrveṇa ca sarvajñadharmeṣvabhiyujyante yathābalaṃ yathāviṣayaṃ yathāsthānam //
S04bsu036_u:1847: tadyathāpi nāma kāśyapa mahāmeghaḥ sarvāvatīṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ saṃchādya samaṃ vāri pramuñcati,

S04bsu036_u:1854: na te ātmanātmānaṃ jānanti vā vedayanti vā budhyanti vā /

S04bsu036_u:1869: tathāgata eva kāśyapa tatra pratyakṣaḥ pratyakṣadarśī yathā ca darśī teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tāsu tāsu bhūmiṣu sthitānāṃ tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ hīnotkṛṣṭamadhyamānām /
S04bsu036_u:1870_0: so 'haṃ kāśyapa ekarasadharma viditvā yaduta vimuktirasaṃ nirvṛtirasaṃ nirvāṇaparyavasānaṃ
S04bsu036_u:1871: āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā yūyaṃ kāśyapa yadyūyaṃ saṃdhābhāṣitaṃ tathāgatasya na śaknutha avataritum /
S04bsu036_u:1874: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamāna imā gāthā abhāṣata -

S04bsu036_u:2791: tatra ca te punarevaitāṃ kriyāṃ śroṣyanti /

S04bsu036_u:2796: pariśuddhaṃ ca parṣadaṃ paśyati adhimuktisārāṃ śūnyadharmagatiṃ gatāṃ dhyānavatīṃ mahādhyānavatīm,
S04bsu036_u:2797: atha khalu bhikṣavastathāgato 'yaṃ kāla iti viditvā sarvān bodhisattvān sarvaśrāvakāṃśca saṃnipātya paścādetamarthaṃ saṃśrāvayati /

S04bsu036_u:2800: upāyakauśalyaṃ khalvidaṃ bhikṣavastathāgatānāmarhatām - dūrapranaṣṭaṃ sattvadhātuṃ viditvā hīnābhiratān kāmapaṅkamagnān,
S04bsu036_u:2802: tadyathāpi nāma bhikṣava iha syāt pañcayojanaśatikamaṭavīkāntāram /

S04bsu036_u:2804: deśikaścaiṣāmeko bhaved vyaktaḥ paṇḍito nipuṇo medhāvī kuśalaḥ khalvaṭavīdurgāṇām /
S04bsu036_u:2806: atha khalu sa mahājanakāyaḥ śrāntaḥ klānto bhītastrastaḥ evaṃ vadet - yat khalvārya deśika pariṇāyaka jānīyāḥ - vayaṃ hi śrāntāḥ klāntā bhītāstrastā anirvṛtāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2809: atha khalu bhikṣavaḥ sa deśika upāyakuśalastān puruṣān pratinivartitukāmān viditvā evaṃ cintayet - mā khalvime tapasvinastādṛśaṃ mahāratnadvīpaṃ na gaccheyuriti /
S04bsu036_u:2811: tasyā aṭavyā madhye yojanaśataṃ vā dviyojanaśataṃ vā triyojanaśataṃ vā atikramya ṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmimīyāt /

S04bsu036_u:2816: atra vo yāni kānicit karaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi kurudhvam /
S04bsu036_u:2820: atha khalu bhikṣavaste kāntāraprāptāḥ sattvā āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptā bhaveyuḥ - muktā vayamaṭavīkāntārāt /
S04bsu036_u:2822: atha khalu bhikṣavaste puruṣāstadṛddhimayaṃ nagaraṃ praviśeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:2826: tatastān deśiko viśrāntān viditvā tadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramantardhāpayet /
S04bsu036_u:2827: antardhāpayitvā ca tān puruṣānevaṃ vadet - āgacchantu bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:2829: idaṃ tu mayā nagaraṃ yuṣmākaṃ viśrāmaṇārthamabhinirmitamiti //

S04bsu036_u:2833: paśyati - mahadidaṃ kleśakāntāraṃ nirgantavyaṃ niṣkrāntavyaṃ prahātavyam /

S04bsu036_u:2837: tatra tathāgataḥ sattvān durbalāśayān viditvā yathā sa deśikastadṛddhimayaṃ nagaramabhinirmitīte teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ viśrāmaṇārtham,

S04bsu036_u:2839_0: evameva bhikṣavastathāgato 'pyarhan samyaksaṃbuddho mahopāyakauśalyena antarā dve

S04bsu036_u:2881: kṣaṇaṃ dvitīyaṃ aparaṃ abhūṣi jinasya tasyo bahu dharma bhāṣataḥ /

S04bsu036_u:2885: ye cāpi te ṣoḍaśa rājaputrā ye aurasā cailakabhūta sarve /

S04bsu036_u:3391: tasmin bhaiṣajyarāja pṛthivīpradeśe tathāgatacaityaṃ kārayitavyaṃ mahantaṃ ratnamayamuccaṃ pragṛhītam /
S04bsu036_u:3395: yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe 'yaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣyeta vā deśyeta vā paṭhyeta vā saṃgāyeta vā likhyeta vā likhito vā pustakagatastiṣṭhet /
S04bsu036_u:3396: tasmiṃśca stūpe satkāro gurukāro mānanā pūjanā arcanā karaṇīyā sarvapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākāvaijayantībhiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3398: ye ca khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja sattvāstaṃ tathāgatacaityaṃ labheran vandanāya pūjanāya darśanāya vā,
S04bsu036_u:3399: sarve te bhaiṣajyarāja abhyāsannībhūtā veditavyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3403: na ca punarimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ labhante darśanāya vā śravaṇāya vā likhanāya vā pūjanāya vā /
S04bsu036_u:3404: na tāvatte bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ kuśalā bhavanti,
S04bsu036_u:3408: tasmin samaye te āsannasthāyino bhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu036_u:3410: tadyathāpi nāma bhaiṣajyarāja kaścideva puruṣo bhavedudakārthī udakagaveṣī /
S04bsu036_u:3412: sa yāvat paśyecchuṣkaṃ pāṇḍaraṃ pāṃsuṃ nirvāhyamānam,
S04bsu036_u:3415: atha pareṇa samayena sa puruṣa ārdrapaṃsumudakasaṃniśraṃ kardamapaṅkabhutamudakabindubhiḥ sravadbhirnirvāhyamānaṃ paśyet,
S04bsu036_u:3417: atha khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja sa puruṣastatpūrvanimittaṃ dṛṣṭvā niṣkāṅkṣo bhavennirvicikitsaḥ - āsannamidaṃ khalūdakamiti /
S04bsu036_u:3418: evameva bhaiṣajyarāja dūre te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu036_u:3421: yadā khalu punarbhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śṛṇvanti udgṛhṇanti dhārayanti vācayanti avataranti svādhyāyanti cintayanti bhavayanti,
S04bsu036_u:3427: yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo 'sya dharmaparyāyasyotraset saṃtraset saṃtrāsamāpadyet,
S04bsu036_u:3428: navayānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3429: sacet punaḥ śrāvakayānīyo 'sya dharmaparyāyasyotraset saṃtraset saṃtrāsamāpadyeta,
S04bsu036_u:3430: adhimānikaḥ sa bhaiṣajyarāja śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo veditavyaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3431: yaḥ kaścid bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayet,
S04bsu036_u:3432_0: tena bhaiṣajyarāja bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatalayanaṃ praviśya tathāgatacīvaraṃ
S04bsu036_u:3432_1: prāvṛtya tathāgatasyāsane niṣadya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3438: tattena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prāvaritavyam /
S04bsu036_u:3443: anavalīnacittena bodhisattvena purastādbodhisattvagaṇasya bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3447: te tasya dharmabhāṇakasya bhāṣitaṃ na pratibādhiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:3452: yāni ca asya asmāddharmaparyāyāt padavyañjanāni paribhraṣṭāni bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:3454: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:3456: durlabho vai śravo hyasya adhimuktī pi durlabhā // Saddhp_10.16 //
S04bsu036_u:3457: udakārthī yathā kaścit khānayet kūpa jaṅgale /
S04bsu036_u:3458: śuṣkaṃ ca pāṃsu paśyeta khānyamāne punaḥ punaḥ // Saddhp_10.17 //
S04bsu036_u:3459: so dṛṣṭvā cintayettatra dūre vāri ito bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:3460: idaṃ nimittaṃ dūre syāt śuṣkapāṃsuritotsṛtaḥ // Saddhp_10.18 //
S04bsu036_u:3461: yadā tu ārdraṃ paśyeta pāṃsuṃ snigdhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3462: niṣṭhā tasya bhavettatra nāsti dūre jalaṃ iha // Saddhp_10.19 //
S04bsu036_u:3463: evameva tu te dūre buddhajñānasya tādṛśāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3464: aśṛṇvanta idaṃ sūtramabhāvitvā punaḥ punaḥ // Saddhp_10.20 //
S04bsu036_u:3466: sūtrarājaṃ śruṇiṣyanti cintayiṣyanti vā sakṛt // Saddhp_10.21 //
S04bsu036_u:3467: te bhonti saṃnikṛṣṭā vai buddhajñānasya paṇḍitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3468: yathaiva cārdre pāṃsusmin āsannaṃ jalamucyate // Saddhp_10.22 //
S04bsu036_u:3469: jinasya lenaṃ praviśitvā prāvaritvā mi cīvaram /
S04bsu036_u:3470: mamāsane niṣīditvā abhīto bhāṣi paṇḍitaḥ // Saddhp_10.23 //
S04bsu036_u:3472: śūnyatā cāsanaṃ mahyamatra sthitvā hi deśayet // Saddhp_10.24 //
S04bsu036_u:3473: loṣṭaṃ daṇḍaṃ vātha śaktī ākrośa tarjanātha vā /
S04bsu036_u:3474: bhāṣantasya bhavettatra smaranto mama tā sahet // Saddhp_10.25 //
S04bsu036_u:3477: ahaṃ pi tasya vīrasya yo mahya parinirvṛte /
S04bsu036_u:3478: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśeyā preṣeṣye bahu nirmitān // Saddhp_10.27 //
S04bsu036_u:3481: tasya pūjāṃ kariṣyanti parṣadaśca samā api // Saddhp_10.28 //
S04bsu036_u:3483: ye cāpi tasya dāsyanti vāreṣyanti sma nirmitāḥ // Saddhp_10.29 //
S04bsu036_u:3485: narairvirahite deśe aṭavyāṃ parvateṣu vā // Saddhp_10.30 //
S04bsu036_u:3487: skhalitaṃ cāsya svādhyāyamuccāriṣye punaḥ punaḥ // Saddhp_10.31 //
S04bsu036_u:3488: tahiṃ ca sya viharato ekasya vanacāriṇaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3489: devān yakṣāṃśca preṣiṣye sahāyāṃstasya naikaśaḥ // Saddhp_10.32 //
S04bsu036_u:3490: etādṛśāstasya guṇā bhavanti caturṇa parṣāṇa prakāśakasya /
S04bsu036_u:3491: eko vihāre vanakandareṣu svādhyāya kurvantu mamāhi paśyet // Saddhp_10.33 //
S04bsu036_u:3492: pratibhāna tasya bhavatī asaṅgaṃ nirukti dharmāṇa bahū prajānāti /
S04bsu036_u:3493: toṣeti so prāṇisahasrakoṭyaḥ yathāpi buddhena adhiṣṭhitatvāt // Saddhp_10.34 //
S04bsu036_u:3494: ye cāpi tasyāśrita bhonti sattvāste bodhisattvā laghu bhonti sarve /
S04bsu036_u:3495: tatsaṃgatiṃ cāpi niṣevamāṇāḥ paśyanti buddhāna yatha gaṅgavālikāḥ // Saddhp_10.35 //
S04bsu036_u:3500: atha khalu bhagavataḥ purastāttataḥ pṛthivīpradeśāt parṣanmadhyāt saptaratnamayaḥ stūpo 'bhyudgataḥ pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena tadanurūpeṇa ca pariṇāhena /
S04bsu036_u:3501_0: abhyudgamya vaihāyasamantarīkṣe samavātiṣṭhaccitro darśanīyaḥ pañcabhiḥ puṣpagrahaṇīyavedikāsahasraiḥ
S04bsu036_u:3501_2: ratnadāmasahasrābhiḥ pralambitaḥ paṭṭaghaṇṭāsahasraiḥ pralambitaḥ tamālapatracandanagandhaṃ pramuñcamānaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3502: tena ca gandhena sarvāvatīyaṃ lokadhātuḥ saṃmūrcchitābhūt /
S04bsu036_u:3504: tadyathā - suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya musāragalvasyāśmagarbhasya lohitamukteḥ karketanasya /
S04bsu036_u:3505: tasmiṃśca stūpe trāyastriṃśatkāyikā devaputrā divyairmāndāravamahāmāndāravaiḥ puṣpaistaṃ ratnastūpamavakiranti adhyavakiranti abhiprakiranti /
S04bsu036_u:3506: tasmācca ratnastūpādevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścarati sma - sādhu sādhu bhagavan śākyamune /
S04bsu036_u:3510_0: atha khalu tāścatasraḥ parṣadastaṃ mahāntaṃ ratnastūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vaihāyasamantarīkṣe
S04bsu036_u:3510_1: sthitaṃ saṃjātaharṣāḥ prītiprāmodyaprasādaprāptāḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmutthāya āsanebhyo
S04bsu036_u:3511: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpratibhāno nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokaṃ kautūhalaprāptaṃ viditvā bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3514: ko vā bhagavan asmānmahāratnastūpādevaṃrūpaṃ śabdaṃ niścārayati?
S04bsu036_u:3515: evamukte bhagavān mahāpratibhānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - asmin mahāpratibhāna mahāratnastūpe tathāgatasyātmabhāvastiṣṭhati ekaghanaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3518: asti mahāpratibhāna adhastāyāṃ diśi asaṃkhyeyāni lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya ratnaviśuddhā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3520: tasyaitadbhagavataḥ purvapraṇidhānamabhūt - ahaṃ khalu pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇo na tāvanniryāto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu036_u:3521: yāvanmayāyaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo bodhisattvāvavādo na śruto 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:3522: yadā tu mayā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śrutaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3524_0: tena khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavatā prabhūtaratnena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena
S04bsu036_u:3524_1: parinirvāṇakālasamaye sadevakasya lokasya samārakasya sabrahmakasya saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ
S04bsu036_u:3524_2: prajāyāḥ purastādevamārocitam - mama khalu bhikṣavaḥ parinirvṛtasya asya tathāgatātmabhāvavigrahasya
S04bsu036_u:3526_0: tasya khalu punarmahāpratibhāna bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyaitadadhiṣṭhānamabhūt
S04bsu036_u:3526_1: - ayaṃ mama stūpo daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣvayaṃ (Vaidya 150)
S04bsu036_u:3529: taistairbuddhairbhagavadbhirasmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye bhāṣyamāṇe parṣanmaṇḍalasyopari vaihāyasaṃ tiṣṭhet /
S04bsu036_u:3530: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmimaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣamāṇānāmayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ sādhukāraṃ dadyāt /
S04bsu036_u:3533: asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau asmin saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye mayā bhāṣyamāṇe 'smāt parṣanmaṇḍalamadhyādabhyudgamya uparyantarīkṣe vaihāyasaṃ sthitvā sādhukāraṃ dadāti sma //
S04bsu036_u:3534: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - paśyāma vayaṃ bhagavan etaṃ tathāgatavigrahaṃ bhagavato 'nubhāvena /
S04bsu036_u:3535_0: evamukte bhagavān mahāpratibhānaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - tasya khalu
S04bsu036_u:3536: etadasya praṇidhānam - yadā khalvanyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu buddhā bhagavanta imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ bhāṣeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3537: tadāyaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpo 'sya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya śravaṇāya gacchet tathāgatānāmantikam /
S04bsu036_u:3538: yadā punaste buddhā bhagavanto mamātmabhāvavigrahamuddhāṭya darśayitukāmā bhaveyuścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadām,
S04bsu036_u:3539: atha taistathāgatairdaśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ya ātmabhāvanirmitāstathāgatavigrahā anyānyanāmadheyāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3540: teṣu teṣu buddhakṣetreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu036_u:3541: tān sarvān saṃnipātya tairātmabhāvanirmitaistathāgatavigrahaiḥ sārdhaṃ paścādayaṃ mamātmabhāvavigrahastūpaḥ samuddhāṭya upadarśayitavyaścatasṛṇāṃ parṣadām /
S04bsu036_u:3543: ye daśasu dikṣvanyonyeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu lokadhātusahasreṣu sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S04bsu036_u:3545: atha khalu mahāpratibhāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - tānapi tāvad bhagavaṃstathāgatātmabhāvāṃstathāgatanirmitān sarvān vandāmahai //
S04bsu036_u:3547: yayā raśmyā samanantarapramuktayā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśatsu gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye buddhā bhagavanto viharanti sma,
S04bsu036_u:3549: tāni ca buddhakṣetrāṇi sphaṭikamayāni saṃdṛśyante sma,
S04bsu036_u:3552: teṣu teṣu buddhā bhagavanto madhureṇa valgunā svareṇa sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu036_u:3553: bodhisattvaśatasahasraiśca paripūrṇāni tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi saṃdṛśyante sma /
S04bsu036_u:3563_0: evaṃ samantāddaśasu dikṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi bahūni gaṅgānadīvālukopamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi
S04bsu036_u:3563_1: bahuṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti,
S04bsu036_u:3566: atha khalu te daśasu dikṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ svān svān bodhisattvagaṇānāmantrayanti sma - gantavyaṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputrā bhaviṣyati asmābhiḥ sahāṃ lokadhātum,
S04bsu036_u:3569: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavantaḥ svaiḥ svairupasthāyakaiḥ sārdhamātmadvitīyā ātmatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:3570_0: iti hi tasmin samaye iyaṃ sarvāvatī lokadhātū ratnavṛkṣapratimaṇḍitābhūd vaiḍūryamayī
S04bsu036_u:3572: iti hi tasmin samaye ye 'syāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaḍgatyupapannāḥ sattvāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3574: sthāpayitvā ye tasyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:3575: atha khalu te buddhā bhagavanta upasthāyakadvitīyā upasthāyakatṛtīyā imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:3576: āgatāgatāśca te tathāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanamupaniśritya viharanti sma /
S04bsu036_u:3578: ekaikasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt pañcayojanaśatānyuccaistvena mahāratnapratimaṇḍitam /
S04bsu036_u:3580: anena paryāyeṇa sarvasyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvaratnavṛkṣamūleṣu tathāgatāḥ paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣaṇṇā abhūvan //
S04bsu036_u:3581: tena khalu punaḥ samayena iyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrī lokadhātustathāgataparipūrṇābhūt /
S04bsu036_u:3582: na tāvad bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyātmabhāvanirmitā ekasmādapi digbhāgāt sarva āgatā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:3583: atha khalu punarbhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhasteṣāṃ tathāgatavigrahāṇāmāgatāgatānāmavakāśaṃ nirmimīte sma /
S04bsu036_u:3586: tāni ca sarvāṇi bahubuddhakṣetrāṇi ekameva buddhakṣetramekameva pṛthivīpradeśaṃ parisaṃsthāpayāmāsa samaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ saptaratnamayaiśca (Vaidya 152)
S04bsu036_u:3589: sarvasmiṃśca ratnavṛkṣamūle pañcayojanaśatānyārohapariṇāhaṃ divyaratnamayaṃ vicitraṃ darśanīyaṃ siṃhāsanaṃ prajñaptamabhūt /
S04bsu036_u:3590: teṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣvāgatāgatāstathāgatāḥ siṃhāsaneṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā niṣīdante sma /
S04bsu036_u:3591: anena paryāyeṇa punaraparāṇi viṃśatilokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyekaikasyāṃ diśi śākyamunistathāgataḥ pariśodhayati sma teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgatānāmavakāśārtham /
S04bsu036_u:3597: tataste tathāgatā niṣīdante sma pṛthak pṛthak siṃhāsaneṣu ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu paryaṅkaṃ baddhvā //
S04bsu036_u:3598: tena khalu punaḥ samayena bhagavatā śākyamuninā ye nirmitāstathāgatāḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayanti sma gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu,
S04bsu036_u:3600: te cāgatā aṣṭāsu dikṣu niṣaṇṇā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:3601: tena khalu punaḥ samayenaikaikasyāṃ diśi triṃśallokadhātukoṭīśatasahasrāṇyaṣṭabhyo digbhyaḥ samantāttaistathāgatairākrāntā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:3602: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sveṣu sveṣu siṃhāsaneṣūpaviṣṭāḥ svān svānupasthāyakān saṃpreṣayanti sma bhagavataḥ śākyamunerantikam /
S04bsu036_u:3603: ratnapuṣpapuṭān datvā evaṃ vadanti sma - gacchata yūyaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam /
S04bsu036_u:3604_0: gatvā ca punastasmiṃstaṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:3604_1: vanditvā asmadvacanādalpābādhatāṃ mandaglānatāṃ ca balaṃ ca sparśavihāratāṃ ca paripṛcchadhvaṃ

S04bsu036_u:3833: asti kaścit sattvo ya idaṃ sūtraratnaṃ satkuryādavaboddhumanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum?
S04bsu036_u:3834_0: mañjuśrīrāha - asti kulaputra sāgarasya nāgarājño duhitā aṣṭavarṣā jātyā mahāprajñā
S04bsu036_u:3835: bodhicittāvinivartinī vistīrṇapraṇidhānā sarvasattveṣvātmapremānugatā guṇotpādane ca samarthā /
S04bsu036_u:3837: smitamukhī paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā maitracittā karuṇāṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate /
S04bsu036_u:3839: prajñākūṭo bodhisattva āha - dṛṣṭo mayā bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato bodhāya ghaṭamāno bodhisattvabhūto 'nekāni puṇyāni kṛtavān /
S04bsu036_u:3840: anekāni ca kalpasahasrāṇi na kadācid vīryaṃ sraṃsitavān /
S04bsu036_u:3841: trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau nāsti kaścidantaśaḥ sarṣapamātro 'pi pṛthivīpradeśaḥ yatrānena śarīraṃ na nikṣiptaṃ sattvahitahetoḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3845: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitā agrataḥ sthitā saṃdṛśyate sma /
S04bsu036_u:3848: puṇyaṃ puṇyaṃ gabhīraṃ ca diśaḥ sphurati sarvaśaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3852: yathecchayā me saṃbodhiḥ sākṣī me 'tra tathāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3854: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāmāyuṣmān śāriputrastāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitarametadavocat - kevalaṃ kulaputri bodhāya cittamutpannam /
S04bsu036_u:3857: asti kulaputri strī na ca vīryaṃ sraṃsayati,
S04bsu036_u:3858: anekāni ca kalpaśatānyanekāni ca kalpasahasrāṇi puṇyāni karoti,
S04bsu036_u:3862: pañca sthānāni strī adyāpi na prāpnoti /
S04bsu036_u:3864: prathamaṃ brahmasthānaṃ dvitīyaṃ śakrasthānaṃ tṛtīyaṃ mahārājasthānaṃ caturthaṃ cakravartisthānaṃ pañcamamavaivartikabodhisattvasthānam //
S04bsu036_u:3865: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitureko maṇirasti,
S04bsu036_u:3866: yaḥ kṛtsnāṃ mahāsāhasrāṃ lokadhātuṃ mūlyaṃ kṣamate /
S04bsu036_u:3867: sa ca maṇistayā sāgaranāgarājaduhitrā bhagavate dattaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3869: atha sāgaranāgarājaduhitā prajñākūṭaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sthaviraṃ ca śāriputrametadavocat - yo 'yaṃ maṇirmayā bhagavato dattaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3870: sa ca bhagavatā śīrghraṃ pratigṛhīto veti?
S04bsu036_u:3871: sthavira āha - tvayā ca śīghraṃ datto bhagavatā ca śīghraṃ pratigṛhītaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3872: sāgaranāgarājaduhitā āha - yadyahaṃ bhadanta śāriputra maharddhikī syām,
S04bsu036_u:3875_0: atha tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sāgaranāgarājaduhitā sarvalokapratyakṣaṃ sthavirasya ca śāriputrasya
S04bsu036_u:3875_1: pratyakṣaṃ tat strīndriyamantarhitaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ ca prādurbhūtaṃ bodhisattvabhūtaṃ
S04bsu036_u:3877: atha dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi vimalā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3878: tatra saptaratnamaye bodhivṛkṣamūle niṣaṇṇamabhisaṃbuddhamātmānaṃ saṃdarśayati sma,
S04bsu036_u:3879: dvātriṃśallakṣaṇadharaṃ sarvānuvyajanarūpaṃ prabhayā ca daśadiśaṃ sphuritvā dharmadeśanāṃ kurvāṇam /
S04bsu036_u:3881: te sarve taṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti sma,
S04bsu036_u:3883: ye ca sattvāstasya tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti,
S04bsu036_u:3886: iyaṃ ca sahā lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prākampat /
S04bsu036_u:3889: atha prajñākūṭo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sthaviraśca śāriputrastūṣṇīmabhūtām //
S04bsu036_u:3894_0: atha khalu bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāpratibhānaśca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
S04bsu036_u:3895: vayamimaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaṃ tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya sattvānāṃ deśayiṣyāmaḥ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3896: kiṃcāpi bhagavan śaṭhakāḥ sattvāstasmin kāle bhaviṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:3897: parīttakuśalamūlā adhimānikā lābhasatkārasaṃniśritā akuśalamūlapratipannā durdamā adhimuktivirahitā anadhimuktibahulāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:3898_0: api tu khalu punarvayaṃ bhagavan kṣāntibalamupadarśayitvā tasmin kāle idaṃ sūtramuddekṣyāmo
S04bsu036_u:3898_1: dhārayiṣyāmo deśayiṣyāmo likhiṣyāmaḥ satkariṣyāmo gurukariṣyāmo mānayiṣyāmaḥ pūjayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3899: kāyajīvitaṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan utsṛjya idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśayiṣyāmaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3901: atha khalu tasyāṃ parṣadi śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ pañcamātrāṇi bhikṣuśatāni bhagavanta metadūcuḥ - vayamapi bhagavan utsahāmahe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayitum,
S04bsu036_u:3902: api tu khalu punarbhagavan anyāsu lokadhātuṣviti /
S04bsu036_u:3903: atha khalu yāvantaste bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ śaikṣāśaikṣā bhagavatā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S04bsu036_u:3905: sarvāṇi tāni yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadūcuḥ - alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu /
S04bsu036_u:3906: vayamapīmaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmastathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya paścime kāle paścime samaye api tvanyāsu lokadhātuṣu /
S04bsu036_u:3908: asyāṃ bhagavan sahāyāṃ lokadhātau adhimānikāḥ sattvā alpakuśalamūlā nityaṃ vyāpannacittāḥ śaṭhā vaṅkajātīyāḥ //
S04bsu036_u:3909_0: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhagavato mātṛbhaginī ṣaḍbhirbhikṣuṇīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:3909_1: śaikṣāśaikṣābhirbhikṣuṇībhiḥ utthāyāsanād yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantamullokayantī sthitābhūt /
S04bsu036_u:3910: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāprajāpatīṃ gautamīmāmantrayāmāsa - kiṃ tvaṃ gautami durmanasvinī sthitā tathāgataṃ vyavalokayasi?
S04bsu036_u:3911: nāhaṃ parikīrtitā vyākṛtā ca anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S04bsu036_u:3912: api tu khalu punargautami sarvaparṣadvayākaraṇena vyākṛtāsi /
S04bsu036_u:3913_0: api tu khalu punastvaṃ gautami ita upādāya aṣṭātriṃśatāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāmantike
S04bsu036_u:3913_1: satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvā mahāsattvo
S04bsu036_u:3914: imānyapi ṣaḍ bhikṣuṇīsahasrāṇi śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ tvayaiva sārdhaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike bodhisattvā dharmabhāṇakā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:3915_0: tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrya sarvasattvapriyadarśano nāma
S04bsu036_u:3915_1: tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyasi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
S04bsu036_u:3915_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S04bsu036_u:3916: sa ca gautami sarvasattvapriyadarśanastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastāni ṣaḍ bodhisattvasahasrāṇi paraṃparāvyākaraṇena vyākariṣyatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
S04bsu036_u:3918: atha khalu rāhulamāturyaśodharāyā bhikṣuṇyā etadabhavat - na me bhagavatā nāmadheyaṃ parikīrtitam /
S04bsu036_u:3919: atha khalu bhagavān yaśodharāyā bhikṣuṇyāścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya yaśodharāṃ bhikṣuṇīmetadavocat - ārocayāmi te yaśodhare,
S04bsu036_u:3921: tvamapi daśānāṃ buddhakoṭīsahasrāṇāmantike satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā bodhisattvo dharmabhāṇako bhaviṣyasi /
S04bsu036_u:3922_0: bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca anupūrveṇa paripūrya raśmiśatasahasraparipūrṇadhvajo nāma tathāgato
S04bsu036_u:3922_2: puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān bhadrāyāṃ lokadhātau /
S04bsu036_u:3923: aparimitaṃ ca tasya bhagavato raśmiśatasahasraparipūrṇadhvajasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāyuṣpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:3924_0: atha khalu mahāprajāpatī gautamī bhikṣuṇī ṣaḍbhikṣuṇīsahasraparivārā yaśodharā ca
S04bsu036_u:3924_1: bhikṣuṇī caturbhikṣuṇīsahasraparivārā bhagavato 'ntikāt svakaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā
S04bsu036_u:3924_2: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau āścaryaprāptā adbhutaprāptāśca tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣanta -
S04bsu036_u:3925: bhagavan vinetāsi vināyako 'si śāstāsi lokasya sadevakasya /
S04bsu036_u:3926: āśvāsadātā naradevapūjito vayaṃ pi saṃtoṣita adya nātha // Saddhp_12.1 //
S04bsu036_u:3927: atha khalu tā bhikṣuṇyaḥ imāṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣitvā bhagavantametadūcuḥ - vayamapi bhagavan samutsahāmahe imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayituṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye,
S04bsu036_u:3929: atha khalu bhagavān yena tānyaśītibodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi dhāraṇīpratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāmavaivartikadharmacakrapravartakānāṃ tenāvalokayāmāsa /
S04bsu036_u:3930_0: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samanantarāvalokitā bhagavatā utthāyāsanebhyo
S04bsu036_u:3930_1: yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmyaivaṃ cintayāmāsuḥ - asmākaṃ bhagavān adhyeṣati asya
S04bsu036_u:3931: te khalvevamanuvicintya saṃprakampitāḥ parasparamūcuḥ - kathaṃ vayaṃ kulaputrāḥ kariṣyāmo yad bhagavānadhyeṣati asya dharmaparyāyasyānāgate 'dhvani saṃprakāśanatāyai?
S04bsu036_u:3932_0: atha khalu te kulaputrā bhagavato gauraveṇa ātmanaśca purvacaryāpraṇidhānena bhagavato
S04bsu036_u:3932_1: 'bhimukhaṃ siṃhanādaṃ nadante sma - vayaṃ bhagavan anāgate 'dhvani imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:3932_2: tathāgate parinirvṛte daśasu dikṣu gatvā sarvasattvāṃllekhayiṣyāmaḥ pāṭhayiṣyāmaścintāpayiṣyāmaḥ
S04bsu036_u:3934: atha khalu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ samasaṃgītyā bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣanta -(Vaidya 164)
S04bsu036_u:3935: alpotsukastvaṃ bhagavan bhavasva vayaṃ tadā te parinirvṛtasya /
S04bsu036_u:3936: svaṃ paścime kāli subhairavasmin prakāśayiṣyāmida sūtramuttamam // Saddhp_12.2 //
S04bsu036_u:3940: aprāpte prāptasaṃjñī ca ghore kālasmi paścime // Saddhp_12.4 //
S04bsu036_u:3942: saṃlekhavṛtticāri sma evaṃ vakṣyanti durmatī // Saddhp_12.5 //
S04bsu036_u:3943: raseṣu gṛddha saktāśca gṛhīṇāṃ dharma deśayī /
S04bsu036_u:3944: satkṛtāśca bhaviṣyanti ṣaḍabhijñā yathā tathā // Saddhp_12.6 //
S04bsu036_u:3948: tīrthikā batime bhikṣū svāni kāvyāni deśayuḥ // Saddhp_12.8 //
S04bsu036_u:3952: viprāṇāṃ gṛhapatīnāṃ ca anyeṣāṃ cāpi bhikṣuṇām // Saddhp_12.10 //
S04bsu036_u:3954: sarvaṃ vayaṃ kṣamiṣyāmo gauraveṇa maharṣiṇām // Saddhp_12.11 //
S04bsu036_u:3955: ye cāsmān kutsayiṣyanti tasmin kālasmi durmatī /
S04bsu036_u:3956: ime buddhā bhaviṣyanti kṣamiṣyāmatha sarvaśaḥ // Saddhp_12.12 //
S04bsu036_u:3958: yakṣarūpā bahu bhikṣū asmākaṃ paribhāṣakāḥ // Saddhp_12.13 //
S04bsu036_u:3960: kṣāntīya kakṣyāṃ bandhitvā sūtrametaṃ prakāśaye // Saddhp_12.14 //
S04bsu036_u:3961: anarthikāḥ sma kāyena jīvitena ca nāyaka /
S04bsu036_u:3962: arthikāśca sma bodhīya tava nikṣepadhārakāḥ // Saddhp_12.15 //
S04bsu036_u:3966: bhṛkuṭī sarva soḍhavyā aprajñaptiḥ punaḥ punaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3969: bhāṣiṣyāma idaṃ sūtraṃ parṣanmadhye viśāradāḥ // Saddhp_12.18 //
S04bsu036_u:3971: gatvā gatvāsya dāsyāmo nikṣepaṃ tava nāyaka // Saddhp_12.19 //
S04bsu036_u:3973: alpotsuko bhava tvaṃ hi śāntiprāpto sunirvṛtaḥ // Saddhp_12.20 //
S04bsu036_u:3974: sarve ca lokapradyotā āgatā ye diśo daśa /
S04bsu036_u:3975: satyāṃ vācaṃ prabhāṣāmo adhimuktiṃ vijānasi // Saddhp_12.21 //
S04bsu036_u:3980: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocata - duṣkaraṃ bhagavan paramaduṣkaramebhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvairutsoḍhaṃ bhagavato gauraveṇa /
S04bsu036_u:3981: kathaṃ bhagavan ebhirbodhisattvairmahāsattvairayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ?
S04bsu036_u:3982_0: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - caturṣu mañjuśrīrdharmeṣu
S04bsu036_u:3982_1: pratiṣṭhitena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ paścime kāle paścime
S04bsu036_u:3984: iha mañjuśrīrbodhisattvena mahāsattvena ācāragocarapratiṣṭhitena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye saṃprakāśayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:3985: kathaṃ ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattva ācāragocarapratiṣṭhito bhavati?
S04bsu036_u:3986: yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣānto bhavati,
S04bsu036_u:3988: yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃściddharme carati,
S04bsu036_u:3993: yadā ca mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rājānaṃ saṃsevate,
S04bsu036_u:3994: na rājaputrān na rājamahāmātrān na rājapuruṣān saṃsevate na bhajate na paryupāste nopasaṃkrāmati,
S04bsu036_u:3997: na ca lokāyatamantradhārakān na lokāyatikān sevate na bhajate na paryupāste,
S04bsu036_u:3998: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti /
S04bsu036_u:3999: na cāṇḍalān na mauṣṭikān na saukarikān na kaukkuṭikān na mṛgalubdhakān na māṃsikān na naṭanṛttakān na jhallān na mallān /
S04bsu036_u:4001: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti /
S04bsu036_u:4004: śrāvakayānīyāṃśca bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā na sevate na bhajate na paryupāste,
S04bsu036_u:4005: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti /
S04bsu036_u:4006: na ca taiḥ saha samavadhānagocaro bhavati caṃkrame vā vihāre vā /
S04bsu036_u:4007: anyatropasaṃkrāntānāṃ caiṣāṃ kālena kālaṃ dharmaṃ bhāṣate,
S04bsu036_u:4010: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na mātṛgrāmasya anyatarānyataramanunayanimittamudgṛhya abhīkṣṇaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati,
S04bsu036_u:4011: na ca mātṛgrāmasya abhīkṣṇaṃ darśanakāmo bhavati /
S04bsu036_u:4013: na ca dārikāṃ vā kanyāṃ vā vadhukāṃ vā abhīkṣṇamābhāṣitavyāṃ manyate,
S04bsu036_u:4016: na ca tena sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti,
S04bsu036_u:4018: na caikākī bhikṣārthamantargṛhaṃ praviśati anyatra tathāgatānusmṛtiṃ bhāvayamānaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4024: na ca śrāmaṇeraṃ na ca śrāmaṇerīṃ na bhikṣuṃ na bhikṣuṇīṃ na kumārakaṃ na kumārikāṃ sātīyati,
S04bsu036_u:4025: na ca taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃstavaṃ karoti,
S04bsu036_u:4030: punaraparaṃ mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmān śūnyān vyavalokayati,
S04bsu036_u:4032: evaṃ hi mañjuśrīrbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhīkṣṇaṃ sarvadharmān vyavalokayan viharati anena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gocare sthito bhavati /
S04bsu036_u:4034: atha khalu bhagavānetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:4036: idaṃ sūtraṃ prakāśetuṃ anolīno viśāradaḥ // Saddhp_13.1 //
S04bsu036_u:4039: ye cāpiṃ rājapuruṣāḥ kuryāttehi na saṃstavam /
S04bsu036_u:4044: upāsikāśca varjeta prākaṭā yā avasthitāḥ // Saddhp_13.5 //
S04bsu036_u:4045: yā nirvṛtiṃ gaveṣanti dṛṣṭe dharme upāsikāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4046: varjayet saṃstavaṃ tābhiḥ ācāro ayamucyate // Saddhp_13.6 //
S04bsu036_u:4048: tasya bhāṣet sadā dhīro anolīno aniśritaḥ // Saddhp_13.7 //
