S04bsu036_u:4495: vasanti ākāśaparigrahe 'smin kṣetrasya heṣṭhā paricāri vīrāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4498: ārabdhavīryāḥ smṛtimanta sarve prajñābalasmin sthita aprameye /
S04bsu036_u:4499: viśāradā dharmu kathenti caite prabhāsvarā putra mamaiti sarve // Saddhp_14.41 //
S04bsu036_u:4500: mayā ca prāpya imamagrabodhiṃ nagare gayāyāṃ drumamūli tatra /
S04bsu036_u:4501: anuttaraṃ vartiya dharmacakraṃ paripācitāḥ sarvi ihāgrabodhau // Saddhp_14.42 //
S04bsu036_u:4502: anāsravā bhūta iyaṃ mi vācā śruṇitva sarve mama śraddadhadhvam /
S04bsu036_u:4503: evaṃ ciraṃ prāpta mayāgrabodhi paripācitāścaiti mayaiva sarve // Saddhp_14.43 //
S04bsu036_u:4504: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca saṃbahulāni bodhisattvakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyāścaryaprāptānyabhūvan,
S04bsu036_u:4505: adbhutaprāptāni vismayaprāptāni - kathaṃ nāma bhagavatā anena kṣaṇavihāreṇa alpena kālāntareṇa amī etāvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ samādāpitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4507_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kathamidānīṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena
S04bsu036_u:4509: tatkathaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatena iyatā kālāntareṇedamaparimitaṃ tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kṛtam,
S04bsu036_u:4511: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśiriyatā bhagavan kālāntareṇa anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitaḥ paripācitaśca?
S04bsu036_u:4512: asya bhagavan bodhisattvagaṇasya bodhisattvarāśergaṇyamānasya kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapyanto nopalabhyate /
S04bsu036_u:4515: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan kaścideva puruṣo navo daharaḥ śiśuḥ kṛṣṇakeśaḥ prathamena vayasā samanvāgataḥ pañcaviṃśativarṣo jātyā bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:4517: evaṃ ca vadet - ete kulaputrā mama putrā iti /
S04bsu036_u:4518: te ca varṣaśatikāḥ puruṣā evaṃ ca vadeyuḥ - eṣo 'smākaṃ pitā janaka iti /
S04bsu036_u:4519: tasya ca puruṣasya bhagavaṃstadvacanamaśraddheyaṃ bhavellokasya duḥśraddheyam /
S04bsu036_u:4528: tāṃśca bhagavānevaṃ vadati - mayaite ādita eva samādāpitāḥ samuttejitāḥ paripācitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4530: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena mayaiṣa sarvavīryaparākramaḥ kṛta iti /
S04bsu036_u:4531: kiṃcāpi vayaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatasya vacanaṃ śraddhayāgamiṣyāmaḥ - ananyathāvādī tathāgata iti /
S04bsu036_u:4533: navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ khalu punarbhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vicikitsāmāpadyante /
S04bsu036_u:4534: atra sthāne parinirvṛte tathāgate imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā na pattīyiṣyanti na śraddhāsyanti nādhimokṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:4535: tataste bhagavan dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:4538: anāgate 'dhvani bodhisattvayānīyāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā śrutvā na vicikitsāmāpadyeranniti //
S04bsu036_u:4539: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavantamābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:4541: prāpto 'si bodhiṃ nagare gayāhvaye kālo 'yamalpo 'tra tu lokanātha // Saddhp_14.44 //
S04bsu036_u:4542: ime ca te ārya viśāradā bahū ye kalpakoṭīcaritā mahāgaṇī /
S04bsu036_u:4543: ṛddhībale ca sthita aprakampitāḥ suśikṣitāḥ prajñabale gatiṃgatāḥ // Saddhp_14.45 //
S04bsu036_u:4544: anūpaliptāḥ padumaṃ va vāriṇā bhittvā mahīṃ ye iha adya āgatāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4545: kṛtāñjalī sarvi sthitāḥ sagauravāḥ smṛtimanta lokādhipatisya putrāḥ // Saddhp_14.46 //
S04bsu036_u:4546: kathaṃ imaṃ adbhutamīdṛśaṃ te taṃ śraddadhiṣyantimi bodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4547: vicikitsanirghātanahetu bhāṣa taṃ tvaṃ caiva deśehi yathaiva arthaḥ // Saddhp_14.47 //
S04bsu036_u:4548: yathā hi puruṣo iha kaścideva daharo bhaveyā śiśu kṛṣṇakeśaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4549: jātyā ca so viṃśatiruttare vā darśeti putrān śatavarṣajātān // Saddhp_14.48 //
S04bsu036_u:4551: valīhi palitehi ca te upetā eṣo ca no dehakaro ti brūyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4552: duḥśraddadhaṃ tadbhavi lokanātha daharasya putrā imi evarūpāḥ // Saddhp_14.49 //
S04bsu036_u:4553: emeva bhagavāṃśca navo vayasthaḥ ime ca vijñā bahubodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4554: smṛtimanta prajñāya viśāradāśca suśikṣitāḥ kalpasahasrakoṭiṣu // Saddhp_14.50 //
S04bsu036_u:4555: dhṛtimanta prajñāya vicakṣaṇāśca prāsādikā darśaniyāśca sarve /
S04bsu036_u:4557: asaṅgacārī pavaneva santi ākāśadhātau satataṃ aniśritāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4558: jānenti vīryaṃ sugatasya putrāḥ paryeṣamāṇā ima buddhabhūmim // Saddhp_14.52 //
S04bsu036_u:4559: kathaṃ nu śraddheyamidaṃ bhaveyā parinirvṛte lokavināyakasmin /
S04bsu036_u:4560: vicikitsa asmāka na kācidasti śṛṇomathā saṃmukha lokanāthā // Saddhp_14.53 //
S04bsu036_u:4561: vicikitsa kṛtvāna imasmi sthāne gaccheyu mā durgati bodhisattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4562: tvaṃ vyākuruṣvā bhagavan yathāvat katha bodhisattvāḥ paripācitā ime // Saddhp_14.54 //
S04bsu036_u:4567: atha khalu bhagavān sarvāvantaṃ bodhisattvagaṇamāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4569: dvitīyakamapi bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4571: tṛtīyakamapi bhagavāṃstan bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - avakalpayadhvaṃ me kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4573: atha khalu sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamagrataḥ sthāpayitvā añjaliṃ pragṛhya bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
S04bsu036_u:4576: dvitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
S04bsu036_u:4579: tṛtīyakamapi sa sarvāṃvān bodhisattvagaṇo bhagavantametadavocat - bhāṣatu bhagavānetamevārtham,
S04bsu036_u:4582: atha khalu bhagavāṃsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yāvattṛtīyakamapyadhyeṣaṇāṃ viditvā tān bodhisattvānāmantrayate sma - tena hi kulaputrāḥ śṛṇudhvamidamevaṃrūpaṃ mamādhiṣṭhānabalādhānam,
S04bsu036_u:4583_0: yadayaṃ kulaputrāḥ sadevamānuṣāsuro loka evaṃ saṃjānīte - sāṃprataṃ bhagavatā śākyamuninā
S04bsu036_u:4585: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ bahūni mama kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya /
S04bsu036_u:4586: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ pañcāśatsu lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu ye pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇavaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4588: sa ekaṃ paramāṇurajaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi pañcāśallokadhātvasaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya tadekaṃ paramāṇurajaḥ samupanikṣipet /
S04bsu036_u:4589: anena paryāyeṇa kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi sa puruṣaḥ sarvāṃstāṃllokadhātūna vyapagatapṛthivīdhātūn kuryāt,
S04bsu036_u:4590: sarvāṇi ca tāni pṛthivīdhātuparamāṇurajāṃsi anena paryāyeṇa anena ca lakṣanikṣepeṇa pūrvasyāṃ diśyupanikṣipet /
S04bsu036_u:4591: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrāḥ śakyaṃ te lokadhātavaḥ kenaciccintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā?
S04bsu036_u:4592: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sa ca sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇo bodhisattvarāśirbhagavantametadavocat - asaṃkhyeyāste bhagavaṃllokadhātavaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4594: sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhairapi bhagavan āryeṇa jñānena na śakyaṃ cintayituṃ vā gaṇayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā /
S04bsu036_u:4595: asmākamapi tāvad bhagavan avaivartyabhūmisthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasmin sthāne cittagocaro na pravartate /
S04bsu036_u:4598: evamukte bhagavāṃstān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānetadavocat - ārocayāmi vaḥ kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4600: yāvantaḥ kulaputrāste lokadhātavo yeṣu tena puruṣeṇa tāni paramāṇurajāṃsyupanikṣiptāni,
S04bsu036_u:4602: sarveṣu teṣu kulaputra lokadhātukoṭīnayutaśatasahasreṣu na tāvanti paramāṇurajāṃsi saṃvidyante,
S04bsu036_u:4604: yataḥprabhṛtyahaṃ kulaputrā asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S04bsu036_u:4606: ye ca mayā kulaputrā atrāntarā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ parikīrtitā dīpaṃkaratathāgataprabhṛtayaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4610: tathāgata āgatāgatānāṃ sattvānāmindriyavīryavaimātratāṃ vyavalokya tasmiṃstasminnātmano nāma vyāharati /
S04bsu036_u:4612: tathā tathā ca sattvān paritoṣayati nānāvidhairdharmaparyāyaiḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4613: tatra kulaputrāstathāgato nānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāmalpakuśalamūlānāṃ bahūpakleśānāmevaṃ vadati - daharo 'hamasmi bhikṣavo jātyābhiniṣkrāntaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4616: tathāgata evaṃ cirābhisaṃbuddha evaṃ vyāharati - acirābhisaṃbuddho 'hamasmīti,
S04bsu036_u:4619: sarve ca te kulaputrā dharmaparyāyāstathāgatena sattvānāṃ vinayārthāya bhāṣitāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4620: yāṃ ca kulaputrāstathāgataḥ sattvānāṃ vinayārthavācaṃ bhāṣate ātmopadarśanena vā paropadarśanena vā,
S04bsu036_u:4621: ātmārambaṇena vā parārambanena vā yatkiṃcittathāgato vyāharati,
S04bsu036_u:4626: na jāyate na mriyate na cyavate nopapadyate na saṃsarati na parinirvāti,
S04bsu036_u:4627: na bhūtaṃ nābhūtaṃ na santaṃ nāsantaṃ na tathā nānyathā na vitathā nāvitathā /
S04bsu036_u:4628: na tathā traidhātukaṃ tathāgatena dṛṣṭaṃ yathā bālapṛthagjanāḥ paśyanti /
S04bsu036_u:4632: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ nānācaritānāṃ nānābhiprāyāṇāṃ saṃjñāvikalpacaritānāṃ kuśalamūlasaṃjananārthaṃ vividhān dharmaparyāyān vividhairārambaṇairvyāharati /
S04bsu036_u:4636: na ca tāvanme kulaputrā adyāpi paurvikī bodhisattvacaryāṃ pariniṣpāditā /
S04bsu036_u:4638: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrā adyāpi taddviguṇena me kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanti āyuṣpramāṇasyāparipūrṇatvāt /
S04bsu036_u:4640: khalu punarahaṃ kulaputrā aparinirvāyamāṇa eva parinirvāṇamārocayāmi /
S04bsu036_u:4642_0: sattvānahaṃ kulaputrā anena paryāyeṇa paripācayāmi - mā haiva me 'ticiraṃ tiṣṭhato
S04bsu036_u:4642_2: andhā dṛṣṭijālasaṃchannāḥ tiṣṭhati tathāgata iti viditvā kilīkṛtasaṃjñā bhaveyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4643: na ca tathāgate durlabhasaṃjñāmutpādayeyuḥ - āsannā vayaṃ tathāgatasyeti /
S04bsu036_u:4646: tataḥ kulaputrāḥ tathāgataḥ upāyakauśalyena teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ durlabhaprādurbhāvo bhikṣavastathāgata iti vācaṃ vyāharati sma /
S04bsu036_u:4648: tathā hi teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bahubhiḥ kalpakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairapi tathāgatadarśanaṃ
S04bsu036_u:4650: tataḥ khalvahaṃ kulaputrāstadārambaṇaṃ kṛtvaivaṃ vadāmi - durlabhaprādurbhāvā hi bhikṣavastathāgatā iti /
S04bsu036_u:4651: te bhūyasyā mātrayā durlabhaprādurbhāvāṃstathāgatān viditvā āścaryasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:4653: apaśyantaśca tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān tṛṣitā bhaviṣyanti tathāgatadarśanāya /
S04bsu036_u:4654: teṣāṃ tāni tathāgatārambaṇamanaskārakuśalamūlāni dīrgharātramarthāya hitāya sukhāya ca bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:4655: etamarthaṃ viditvā tathāgato 'parinirvāyanneva parinirvāṇamārocayati sattvānāṃ vaineyavaśamupādāya /
S04bsu036_u:4658: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputrāḥ kaścideva vaidyapuruṣo bhavet paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī sukuśalaḥ sarvavyādhipraśamanāya /
S04bsu036_u:4659: tasya ca puruṣasya bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyurdaśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā /
S04bsu036_u:4661: te cāsya sarve putrā garapīḍā vā viṣapīḍā vā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4662: tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirabhitūrṇā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4663: te tena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā dahyamānāḥ pṛthivyāṃ prapateyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4664: atha sa teṣāṃ vaidyaḥ pitā pravāsādāgacchet /
S04bsu036_u:4665: te cāsya putrāstena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā duḥkhābhirvedanābhirārtāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4668: sarve ca te tenaiva duḥkhenārtāstaṃ pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvābhinandeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4669: evaṃ cainaṃ vadeyuḥ - diṣṭyāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgataḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4672: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrān duḥkhārtān dṛṣṭvā vedanābhibhūtān dahyataḥ pṛthivyāṃ pariveṣṭamānān,
S04bsu036_u:4673: tato mahābhaiṣajyaṃ samudānayitvā varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannaṃ ca,
S04bsu036_u:4674: śilāyāṃ piṣṭvā teṣāṃ putrāṇāṃ pānāya dadyāt,
S04bsu036_u:4675: evaṃ cainān vadet - pibatha putrā idaṃ mahābhaiṣajyaṃ varṇasaṃpannaṃ gandhasaṃpannaṃ rasasaṃpannam /
S04bsu036_u:4676: idaṃ yūyaṃ putrā mahābhaiṣajyaṃ pītvā kṣipramevāsmād garādvā viṣādvā parimokṣyadhve,
S04bsu036_u:4678: tatra ye tasya vaidyasya putrā aviparītasaṃjñinaḥ te bhaiṣajyasya varṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā gandhaṃ cāghrāya rasaṃ cāsvādya kṣipramevābhyavahareyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4679: te cābhyavaharantastasmādābādhāt sarveṇa sarvaṃ vimuktā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4680: ye punastasya putrā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ te taṃ pitaramabhinandeyuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4681: enaṃ caivaṃ vadeyuḥ - diṣṭayāsi tāta kṣemasvastibhyāmāgato yastvamasmākaṃ cikitsaka iti /
S04bsu036_u:4685: tathā hi teṣāṃ tayā viparītasaṃjñyā tad bhaiṣajyamupanāmitaṃ varṇenāpi na rocate,
S04bsu036_u:4687: atha khalu sa vaidyapuruṣa evaṃ cintayet - ime mama putrā anena gareṇa vā viṣeṇa vā viparītasaṃjñinaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4691: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānupāyakauśalyena tadbhaiṣajyaṃ pāyayitukāma evaṃ vadet - jīrṇo 'hamasmi kulaputrāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4699: sa evaṃ tān putrānupāyakauśalyena anuśiṣya anyataraṃ janapadapradeśaṃ prakrāntaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4700: tatra gatvā kālagatamātmānaṃ yeṣāṃ glānānāṃ putrāṇāmārocayet,
S04bsu036_u:4702: atīva parideveyuḥ - yo hyasmākaṃ pitā nātho janako 'nukampakaḥ so 'pi nāmaikaḥ kālagataḥ,
S04bsu036_u:4704: te khalvanāthabhūtamātmānaṃ samanupaśyanto 'śaraṇamātmānaṃ samanupaśyanto 'bhīkṣṇaṃ śokārtā bhaveyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4705: teṣāṃ ca tayābhīkṣṇaṃ śokārtatayā sā viparītasaṃjñā aviparītasaṃjñā bhavet /
S04bsu036_u:4706: yacca tad bhaiṣajyaṃ varṇagandharasopetaṃ tadvarṇagandharasopetameva saṃjānīyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:4709: atha khalu sa vaidyastān putrānābādhavimuktān viditvā punarevātmānamupadarśayet /
S04bsu036_u:4710: tatkiṃ manyadhve kulaputrā mā haiva tasya vaidyasya tadupāyakauśalyaṃ kurvataḥ kaścinmṛṣāvādena saṃcodayet?
S04bsu036_u:4714: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ ahamantarāntaramevaṃrūpāṇyupāyakauśalyāni sattvānāmupadarśayāmi vinayārtham /
S04bsu036_u:4715: na ca me kaścidatra sthāne mṛṣāvādo bhavati //
S04bsu036_u:4716: atha khalu bhagavānimāmeva arthagatiṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānastasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:4717: acintiyā kalpasahasrakoṭyo yāsāṃ pramāṇaṃ na kadāci vidyate /
S04bsu036_u:4718: prāptā mayā eṣa tadāgrabodhirdharmaṃ ca deśemyahu nityakālam // Saddhp_15.1 //
S04bsu036_u:4719: samādapemī bahubodhisattvān bauddhasmi jñānasmi sthapemi caiva /
S04bsu036_u:4723: na cāpi nirvāmyahu tasmi kāle ihaiva co dharmu prakāśayāmi // Saddhp_15.3 //

S04bsu036_u:5369: prāmodya tatrāpi janeti so 'graṃ pūjāṃ ca tasya kurute 'prameyām // Saddhp_18.54 //
S04bsu036_u:5370: devā pi nāgāsuraguhyakāśca draṣṭuṃ tamicchanti ca nityakālam /

S04bsu036_u:5375: saputradārā kariyāṇa añjaliṃ śṛṇvanti dharmasya ca nityakālam // Saddhp_18.57 //
S04bsu036_u:5377: yakṣāṇa co bhoti sadā puraskṛto nāgāna gandharvagaṇāna caiva /
S04bsu036_u:5378: piśācakānāṃ ca piśācikānāṃ susatkṛto mānitu pūjitaśca // Saddhp_18.58 //
S04bsu036_u:5379: brahmāpi tasya vaśavarti bhoti maheśvaro īśvara devaputraḥ /

S04bsu036_u:5383_0: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayamāṇo
S04bsu036_u:5383_1: vā vācayamāno vā prakāśayamāno vā deśayamāno vā likhamāno vā aṣṭau kāyaguṇaśatāni pratilapsyati /
S04bsu036_u:5384: tasya kāyaḥ śuddhaḥ pariśuddho vaiḍūryapariśuddhacchavivarṇo bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5386: sa tasminnātmabhāve pariśuddhe sarvaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuṃ drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5387: ye ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāścyavanti upapadyante ca,
S04bsu036_u:5391: ye ca cakravālamahācakravāleṣu merusumeruṣu ca parvatarājeṣu sattvāḥ prativasanti,
S04bsu036_u:5392: ye ca adhastādavīcyāmūrdhvaṃ ca yāvad bhavāgraṃ sattvāḥ prativasanti,
S04bsu036_u:5394: ye cāpi kecidasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātrau śrāvakā vā pratyekabuddhā vā bodhisattvā vā tathāgatā vā prativasanti,
S04bsu036_u:5395: yaṃ ca te tathāgatā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S04bsu036_u:5397: sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ sattvānāmātmabhāvapratilambhān sva ātmabhāve drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5400: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:5401: pariśuddha tasyo bhavatetmabhāvo yathāpi vaiḍūryamayo viśuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5402: sattvāna nityaṃ priyadarśanaśca yaḥ sūtra dhāreti idaṃ udāram // Saddhp_18.61 //
S04bsu036_u:5403: ādarśapṛṣṭhe yatha vimbu paśyet loko 'sya kāye ayu dṛśyate tathā /
S04bsu036_u:5405: svayaṃbhu so paśyati nānyi sattvāḥ pariśuddhi kāyasmi ima evarūpā // Saddhp_18.62 //
S04bsu036_u:5406: ye lokadhātau hi ihāsti sattvā manuṣya devāsura guhyakā vā /
S04bsu036_u:5407: narakeṣu preteṣu tiraścayoniṣu pratibimbu saṃdṛśyati tatra kāye // Saddhp_18.63 //
S04bsu036_u:5408: vimāna devāna bhavāgra yāvacchailaṃ pi co parvatacakravālam /
S04bsu036_u:5409: himavān sumeruśca mahāṃśca meruḥ kāyasmi dṛśyantimi sarvathaiva // Saddhp_18.64 //
S04bsu036_u:5410: buddhān pi so paśyati ātmabhāve saśrāvakān buddhasutāṃstathānyān /
S04bsu036_u:5411: ye bodhisattvā viharanti caikakā gaṇe ca ye dharma prakāśayanti // Saddhp_18.65 //
S04bsu036_u:5412: etādṛśī kāyaviśuddhi tasya yahi dṛśyate sarviya lokadhātuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5413: na ca tāva so divya na prāpuṇoti prakṛtīya kāyasyiyamīdṛśī bhavet // Saddhp_18.66 //
S04bsu036_u:5414_0: punaraparaṃ satatasamitābhiyukta asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāgate parinirvṛte
S04bsu036_u:5414_1: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayato deśayataḥ saṃprakāśayato likhato vācayatastairdvādaśabhirmanaskāraguṇaśataiḥ
S04bsu036_u:5415: sa tena pariśuddhena manaindriyeṇa yadyekagāthāmapyantaśaḥ śroṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5417: sa tāvamabudhya tannidānaṃ māsamapi dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5420: so 'sya smṛto na sa saṃpramoṣaṃ yāsyati /
S04bsu036_u:5421: ye kecillaukikā lokavyavahārā bhāṣyāṇi vā mantrā vā,
S04bsu036_u:5423: yāvantaśca kecitrisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṭsu gatiṣūpapannāḥ sattvāḥ saṃsaranti,
S04bsu036_u:5426: apratilabdhe ca tāvadāryajñāne evaṃrūpaṃ cāsya manaindriyaṃ pariśuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:5427: yāṃ yāṃ ca dharmaniruktimanuvicintya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5431: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu036_u:5432: manaindriyaṃ tasya viśuddha bhoti prabhāsvaraṃ śuddhamanāvilaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:5433: so tena dharmān vividhān prajānati hīnānathotkṛṣṭa tathaiva madhyamān // Saddhp_18.67 //
S04bsu036_u:5434: ekāmapi gātha śruṇitva dhīro artha bahuṃ jānati tasya tatra /
S04bsu036_u:5435: samitaṃ ca bhūtaṃ ca sadā prabhāṣate māsān pi catvāri tathāpi varṣam // Saddhp_18.68 //
S04bsu036_u:5436: ye cāpi sattvā iha lokadhātau abhyantare bāhiri ye vasanti /
S04bsu036_u:5437: devā manuṣyāsuraguhyakāśca nāgāśca ye cāpi tiraścayoniṣu // Saddhp_18.69 //
S04bsu036_u:5438: ṣaṭsu gatīṣu nivasanti sattvā vicintitaṃ teṣa bhaveta yaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:5439: ekakṣaṇe sarvi vidurvijānate dhāretva sūtraṃ ima ānuśaṃsāḥ // Saddhp_18.70 //
S04bsu036_u:5440: yaṃ cāpi buddhaḥ śatapuṇyalakṣaṇo dharmaṃ prakāśedida sarvaloke /
S04bsu036_u:5441: tasyāpi śabdaṃ śṛṇute viśuddhaṃ yaṃ cāpi so bhāṣati gṛhyate tat // Saddhp_18.71 //
S04bsu036_u:5442: bahūn vicinteti ca agradharmān bahūṃśca so bhāṣati nityakālam /
S04bsu036_u:5443: na cāsya saṃmoha kadāci bhoti dhāretva sūtraṃ imi ānuśaṃsāḥ // Saddhp_18.72 //
S04bsu036_u:5444: saṃdhiṃ visaṃdhiṃ ca vijānate 'sau sarveṣu dharmeṣu vilakṣaṇāni /
S04bsu036_u:5445: prajānate artha niruktayaśca yathā ca taṃ jānati bhāṣate tathā // Saddhp_18.73 //
S04bsu036_u:5447: yaṃ bhāṣitaṃ bhotiha dīrgharātraṃ pūrvehi lokācariyehi sūtram /
S04bsu036_u:5448: taṃ dharma so bhāṣati nityakālaṃ asaṃtrasanto pariṣāya madhye // Saddhp_18.74 //
S04bsu036_u:5449: manaindriyaṃ īdṛśamasya bhoti dhāretva sūtraṃ imu vācayitvā /
S04bsu036_u:5450: na ca tāva asaṅgaṃ labhate ha jñānaṃ pūrvaṃgamaṃ tasya imaṃ tu bhoti // Saddhp_18.75 //
S04bsu036_u:5451: ācāryabhūmau hi sthitaśca bhoti sarveṣa sattvāna katheya dharmam /
S04bsu036_u:5452: niruktikoṭīkuśalaśca bhoti imu dhārayanto sugatasya sutram // Saddhp_18.76 //
S04bsu036_u:5457_0: atha khalu bhagavān mahāsthāmaprāptaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - anenāpi
S04bsu036_u:5457_1: tāvanmahāsthāmaprāpta paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyam - yathā ya imamevaṃrūpaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pratikṣepsyanti,
S04bsu036_u:5463: ye ca imamaevaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntaṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti,
S04bsu036_u:5465: teṣāmevamiṣṭo vipāko bhaviṣyati yādṛśo mayā pūrvaṃ parikīrtitaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:5467_2: 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
S04bsu036_u:5467_3: śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān vinirbhoge kalpe mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau /
S04bsu036_u:5468_0: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bhagavān bhīṣmagarjitasvararājastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5468_1: mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya purato dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:5469_0: yadidaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ caturāryasatyasaṃprayuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsasamatikramāya
S04bsu036_u:5470: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya tathāgatajñānadarśanaparyavasānaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:5471_0: tasya khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu036_u:5474_0: tasyāṃ khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya
S04bsu036_u:5474_1: tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya saddharmapratirūpake ca antarhite
S04bsu036_u:5474_2: aparo 'pi bhīṣmagarjitasvararāja eva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi
S04bsu036_u:5474_3: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca
S04bsu036_u:5475: anayā mahāsthāmaprāpta paraṃparayā tasyāṃ mahāsaṃbhavāyāṃ lokadhātau bhīṣmagarjitasvararājanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṃśatikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:5476: tatra mahāsthāmaprāpta yo 'sau tathāgataḥ sarvapūrvako 'bhūd bhīṣmagarjitasvararājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato
S04bsu036_u:5477: lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān,
S04bsu036_u:5478: tasya bhagavataḥ parinirvṛtasya saddharme 'ntarhite saddharmapratirūpake ca antardhīyamāne tasmin śāsane 'dhimānikabhikṣvadhyākrānte (Vaidya 225)
S04bsu036_u:5480: kena kāraṇena mahāsthāmaprāpta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadāparibhūta ityucyate?
S04bsu036_u:5481: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaṃ yameva paśyati bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣūṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā,
S04bsu036_u:5482: taṃ tamupasaṃkramya eva vadati - nāhamāyuṣmanto yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmi /
S04bsu036_u:5486: bhaviṣyatha yūyaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti /
S04bsu036_u:5487: anena mahāsthāmaprāpta paryāyeṇa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhikṣubhūto noddeśaṃ karoti,
S04bsu036_u:5490: sarvaṃ tamupaṃsakramya evaṃ saṃśrāvayati bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣuṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā,
S04bsu036_u:5491: taṃ tamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ vadati - nāhaṃ bhaginyo yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmi /
S04bsu036_u:5496: yaṃ yameva mahāsthāmaprāpta sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye bhikṣuṃ vā bhikṣuṇīṃ vā upāsakaṃ vā upāsikāṃ vā evaṃ saṃśrāvayati,
S04bsu036_u:5499: paribhūtamātmānaṃ karoti yadasmākaṃ vyākarotyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau asantamanākāṅkṣitaṃ ca /
S04bsu036_u:5500: atha khalu mahāsthāmaprāpta tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bahūni varṣāṇi tathā ākruśyataḥ paribhāṣyamāṇasya gacchanti /
S04bsu036_u:5503: ye cāsya evaṃ saṃśrāvayato loṣṭaṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā kṣipanti,
S04bsu036_u:5504: sa teṣāṃ dūrata eva uccaiḥsvaraṃ kṛtvā saṃśrāvayati sma - nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmīti /
S04bsu036_u:5505: tasya tābhirabhimānikabhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikābhiḥ satatasamitaṃ saṃśrāvyamāṇābhiḥ sadāparibhūta iti nāma kṛtamabhūt //
S04bsu036_u:5506_0: tena khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta sadāparibhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kālakriyāyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5506_1: pratyupasthitāyāṃ maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śruto 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5507: tena ca bhagavatā bhīṣmagarjitasvararājena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo viṃśatibhirgāthāviṃśatikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrairbhāṣito 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5508: sa ca sadāparibhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo maraṇakālasamaye pratyupasthite antarīkṣanirghoṣādimaṃ dharmaparyāyamaśrauṣīt /
S04bsu036_u:5509: yena kenacid bhāṣitamantarīkṣānnirghoṣaṃ śrutvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgṛhītavān,
S04bsu036_u:5510: imāṃ caivaṃrūpāṃ cakṣurviśuddhiṃ śrotraviśuddhiṃ ghrāṇaviśuddhiṃ jihvāviśuddhiṃ kāyaviśuddhiṃ manoviśuddhiṃ ca pratilabdhavān /
S04bsu036_u:5511: sahapratilabdhābhirviśuddhibhiḥ punaranyāni viṃśativarṣakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ātmano jīvitasaṃskāramadhiṣṭhāya imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśitavān /
S04bsu036_u:5513: ye pūrvaṃ nāhaṃ yuṣmākaṃ paribhavāmīti saṃśrāvitāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5517: sarve tena anyāni ca bahūni prāṇikoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitānyabhūvan //
S04bsu036_u:5518: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataścyavitvā candrasvararājasahanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṃśatikoṭīśatānyārāgitavān,
S04bsu036_u:5520_0: so 'nupūrveṇa tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlena punarapyanupūrveṇa dundubhisvararājasahanāmnāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5523: so 'nenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlena punarapyapūrveṇa meghasvararājasahanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṃśatimeva tathāgatakoṭīśatasahasrāṇyārāgitavān,
S04bsu036_u:5527: śrotrapariśuddhyā ghrāṇapariśuddhayā jihvāpariśuddhayā kāyapariśuddhayā manaḥpariśuddhayā samanvāgato 'bhūt //
S04bsu036_u:5528_0: sa khalu punarmahāsthāmaprāpta sadāparibhūto bodhisattvo mahāsattva iyatāṃ tathāgata
S04bsu036_u:5528_1: koṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā
S04bsu036_u:5528_2: anyeṣāṃ ca bahūnāṃ buddhakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ kṛtvā,
S04bsu036_u:5529: sarveṣu ca teṣu imameva saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyamārāgitavān,
S04bsu036_u:5530: ārāgayitvā sa tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlena paripakvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5531: syātkhalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta evaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sadāparibhūto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:5532: yastasya bhagavato bhīṣmagarjitasvararājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ sadāparibhūtaḥ saṃmato 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:5533: yena te tāvantastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ārāgitā abhūvan?
S04bsu036_u:5534: na khalu punaste mahāsthāmaprāpta evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu036_u:5536: ahameva sa mahāsthāmaprāpta tena kālena tena samayena sadāparibhūto nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūvam /
S04bsu036_u:5537: yadā mayā mahāsthāmaprāpta pūrvamayaṃ dharmaparyāyo nodgṛhīto 'bhaviṣyat,
S04bsu036_u:5540: yataścāhaṃ mahāsthāmaprāpta paurvikāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikādimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhāritavān vācitavān deśitavān,
S04bsu036_u:5542_0: yānyapi tāni mahāsthāmaprāpta tena sadāparibhūtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhikṣuśatāni
S04bsu036_u:5542_1: bhikṣuṇīśatāni ca upāsakaśatāni upāsikāśatāni ca tasya bhagavataḥ śāsane imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5548: daśa ca kalpasahasrāṇyavīcau mahānarake dāruṇāṃ vedanāṃ vedayāmāsuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5549: te ca sarve tasmāt karmāvaraṇāt parimuktāḥ
S04bsu036_u:5550: / tenaiva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena paripācitā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /

S04bsu036_u:5874: atha khalviyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrī lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitā,
S04bsu036_u:5876: tasya ca sarvasattvapriyadarśanasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sa bāhuryathāpaurāṇaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt,
S04bsu036_u:5877: yaduta tasyaiva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya jñānabalādhānena puṇyabalādhānena ca /
S04bsu036_u:5878: syāt khalu punaste nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt?
S04bsu036_u:5879: na khalu punaste nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu036_u:5881: ayaṃ sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena kālena tena samayena sarvasattvapriyadarśano bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5882: iyanti nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bhaiṣajyarājo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo duṣkarakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi karoti,
S04bsu036_u:5884_1: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimākāṅkṣamāṇo yaḥ pādāṅguṣṭhaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5885: ekāṃ hastāṅguliṃ pādāṅguliṃ vā ekāṅgaṃ vā bāhumādīpayet,
S04bsu036_u:5886: bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ prasavati /
S04bsu036_u:5887: na tveva rājyaparityāgānna priyaputraduhitṛbhāryāparityāgānna trisāhasramahāsāhasrīlokadhātoḥ savanasamudraparvatotsasarastaḍāgakūpārāmāyāḥ parityāgāt /
S04bsu036_u:5888_1: vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrīṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇāṃ kṛtvā
S04bsu036_u:5889: sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tāvat puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S04bsu036_u:5890: yāvat sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yaḥ itaḥ saddharmapuṇḍarīkāddharmaparyāyādantaśaścatuṣpādikāmapi gāthāṃ dhārayet,
S04bsu036_u:5892: na tvevaṃ imāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrīṃ lokadhātuṃ saptaratnaparipūrṇāṃ kṛtvā dānaṃ dadatastasya sarvabuddhabodhisattvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhebhyaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5893: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāmutsasarastaḍāgānāṃ mahāsamudro mūrdhaprāptaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5894: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāmayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo mūrdhaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5895: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ kālaparvatānāṃ cakravālānāṃ mahācakravālānāṃ ca sumeruḥ parvatarājo mūrdhaprāptaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5897: ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāṃ rājā mūrdhaprāptaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5898: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ nakṣatrāṇāṃ candramāḥ prabhākaro 'graprāptaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5899: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāmayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaścandrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrātirekaprabhākaro 'graprāptaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5900: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sūryamaṇḍalaṃ sarvaṃ tamondhakāraṃ vidhamati,
S04bsu036_u:5901: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvākuśalatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
S04bsu036_u:5902: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña trāyastriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5903: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sūtrāntānāmindraḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5904: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña brahmā sahāṃpatiḥ sarveṣāṃ brahmakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ rājā brahmaloke pitṛkāryaṃ karoti,
S04bsu036_u:5905_0: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5905_1: sattvānāṃ śaikṣāśaikṣāṇāṃ ca sarvaśrāvakāṇāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5906: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarvabālapṛthagjanānatikrāntaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī anāgāmī arhan pratyekabuddhaśca,
S04bsu036_u:5907: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvāṃstathāgatabhāṣitān sūtrāntānatikramya abhyudgato mūrdhaprāpto veditavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5911: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ bodhisattvo 'gra ākhyāyate,
S04bsu036_u:5912: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarveṣāṃ tathāgatabhāṣitānāṃ sutrāntānāmagra ākhyāyate /
S04bsu036_u:5913: tadyathāpi nāma nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña sarveṣāṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ tathāgato dharmarājaḥ paṭṭabaddhaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5914: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyastathāgatabhūto bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitānām /
S04bsu036_u:5915: trātā khalvapi nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvabhayebhyaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5917_0: taḍāga iva tṛṣitānāmagniriva śītārtānāṃ cailamiva nagnānāṃ sārthavāha iva vaṇijānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5917_1: māteva putrāṇāṃ nauriva pāragāmināṃ vaidya iva āturāṇāṃ dīpa iva tamondhakārāvṛtānāṃ
S04bsu036_u:5917_2: ratnamiva dhanārthināṃ cakravartīva sarvakoṭṭarājānāṃ samudra iva saritāmulkeva sarvatamondhakāravidhamanāya /
S04bsu036_u:5918: evameva nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ sarvaduḥkhapramocakaḥ sarvavyādhicchedakaḥ sarvasaṃsārabhayabandhanasaṃkaṭapramocakaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5919: yena cāyaṃ nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ śruto bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5922: eṣāṃ nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña puṇyābhisaṃskārāṇāṃ bauddhena jñānena na śakyaṃ paryanto 'dhigantum,
S04bsu036_u:5923: yāvantaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5924: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayitvā vācayitvā vā deśayitvā vā śrutvā vā likhitvā (Vaidya 242)
S04bsu036_u:5925_0: vā pustakagataṃ vā kṛtvā satkuryāt gurukuryānmānayet pūjayet puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākavaijayantībhirvādyavastrāñjalikarmabhirvā
S04bsu036_u:5925_3: pūjābhiḥ satkāraṃ kuryād gurukāraṃ kuryāt mānanāṃ kuryāt pūjanāṃ kuryāt,
S04bsu036_u:5927: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati ya imaṃ bhaiṣajyarājapūvayogaparivartaṃ dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati śroṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5928: sacet punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña mātṛgrāma imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā udgahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati tasya sa eva paścimaḥ strībhāvo bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5929_1: pañcāśatyāṃ śrutvā mātṛgrāmaḥ pratipatsyate sa khalvataścyutaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate
S04bsu036_u:5929_2: yasyāṃ sa bhagavānamitāyustathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati /
S04bsu036_u:5930: sa tasyāṃ padmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇa upapatsyate /
S04bsu036_u:5932: na dveṣo na moho na māno na mātsaryaṃ na krodho na vyāpādaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5935: anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dvāsaptatigaṅgānadīvālikāsamāṃstathāgatān drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5937: yena cakṣurindriyeṇa pariśuddhena tān buddhān bhagavato drakṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:5938: te cāsya buddhā bhagavantaḥ sādhukāramanupradāsyanti - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S04bsu036_u:5939_0: yattvayā saddharmapuṇḍarīkaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā tasya bhagavataḥ śākyamunestathāgatasyārhataḥ
S04bsu036_u:5939_1: samyaksaṃbuddhasya pravacane uddiṣṭaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ bhāvitaṃ cintitaṃ manasi kṛtaṃ
S04bsu036_u:5940: ayaṃ te kulaputra puṇyābhisaṃskāro na śakyamagninā dagdhuṃ nodakena hartum /
S04bsu036_u:5941: ayaṃ te kulaputra puṇyābhisaṃskāro na śakyaṃ buddhasahesreṇāpi nirdeṣṭum /
S04bsu036_u:5944: na tava kulaputra sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyāṃ sadṛśo vidyate tathāgatamekaṃ vinirmucya /
S04bsu036_u:5945: nānyaḥ kaścicchrāvako vā pratyekabuddho vā bodhisattvo vā yastvāṃ śaktaḥ puṇyena vā prajñayā vā samādhinā vā abhibhavitum /
S04bsu036_u:5946: evaṃ jñānabalādhānaprāptaḥ sa nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña bodhisattvo bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:5947: yaḥ kaścinnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña imaṃ bhaiṣajyarājapūrvayogaparivartaṃ bhāṣyamāṇaṃ śrutvā sādhukāramanupradāsyati,
S04bsu036_u:5953: tasmāttarhi nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña anuparindāmyahamimaṃ sarvasattvapriyadarśanasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūrvayogaparivartam,
S04bsu036_u:5954: yathā paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcāśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmasmin jambudvīpe pracaret,
S04bsu036_u:5958: na nāgā na yakṣā na gandharvā na kumbhāṇḍā avatāraṃ labheyuḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5961: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śrutvā vyādhiḥ kāye na kramiṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:5963: sacet punarnakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña yaḥ kaścid bodhisattvayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paśyedevaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntadhārakaṃ bhikṣum,
S04bsu036_u:5965: abhyavakīrya caivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - gamiṣyatyayaṃ kulaputro bodhimaṇḍam /
S04bsu036_u:5972_1: vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃrūpaṃ sūtrāntadhārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ dṛṣṭvā evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam
S04bsu036_u:5973: asmin khalu punarbhaiṣajyapūrvayogaparivarte nirdiśyamāne caturaśītīnāṃ bodhisattvasahasrāṇāṃ sarvarutakauśalyānugatāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5974: sa ca bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu nakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijña,
S04bsu036_u:5977: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye bhaiṣajyarājapūrvayogaparivarto nāma dvāviṃśatimaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:5981: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇād bhrūvivarāntarādūrṇākośāt prabhāṃ pramumoca,
S04bsu036_u:5982: yayā prabhayā pūrvasyāṃ diśi aṣṭādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi ābhayā sphuṭānyabhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:5983: tāni ca aṣṭādaśagaṅgānadīvālikāsamāni buddhakṣetrakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇyatikramya vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitā nāma lokadhātuḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5984: tatra kamaladalavimalanakṣatrarājasaṃkusumitābhijño nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati vipulenāyuṣpramāṇena /
S04bsu036_u:5985: vipulena bodhisattvasaṃghena sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:5986: atha khalu yā bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenorṇākośāt prabhā pramuktāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:5987: sā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ vairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāṃ lokadhātuṃ mahatyā ābhayā spharati sma /
S04bsu036_u:5988: tasyāṃ khalu punarvairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāyāṃ lokadhātau gadgadasvaro nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prativasati sma avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5989: dṛṣṭapūrvāśca tena bahūnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmevaṃrūpā raśmyavabhāsāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:5993: tasya khalu punargadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sā prabhā kāye nipatitābhūt /
S04bsu036_u:5994: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇāmya taṃ
S04bsu036_u:5995_1: - gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavaṃstāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ taṃ bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ
S04bsu036_u:6003_1: samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ gadgadasvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na tvayā kulaputra
S04bsu036_u:6006: sa ca bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho hrasvakāyaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6013: tasmāttarhi kulaputra tāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ gatvā mā hīnasaṃjñāmutpādayiṣyasi tathāgate ca bodhisattveṣu ca tasmiṃśca buddhakṣetre //
S04bsu036_u:6016: gamiṣyāmyahaṃ bhagavaṃstāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātuṃ tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena tathāgatabalādhānena tathāgatavikrīḍitena tathāgatavyūhena tathāgatābhyudgatajñānena /
S04bsu036_u:6017: atha khalu gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasyāṃ velāyāmanuccalita eva tasmād buddhakṣetrādanutthitaścaiva tasmādāsanāt tathārūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma,
S04bsu036_u:6018_0: yasya samādheḥ samanantarasamāpannasya gadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya atha tāvadeveha
S04bsu036_u:6018_1: sahāyāṃ lokadhātau gṛdhrakūṭe parvate tasya tathāgatadharmāsanasya purastāccaturaśītipadmakoṭīnayutaśatasahasrāṇi
S04bsu036_u:6018_2: prādurbhūtānyabhūvan suvarṇadaṇḍāni rupyapatrāṇi padmakiṃśukarvaṇāni saṃdṛśyante sma //
S04bsu036_u:6019_0: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtastaṃ padmavyūhaprādurbhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ
S04bsu036_u:6019_1: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadavocat - kasyedaṃ bhagavan pūrvanimittaṃ yenemāni
S04bsu036_u:6020_0: evamukte bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtametadavocat - eṣa mañjuśrīḥ pūrvasmāddigbhāgādvairocanaraśmipratimaṇḍitāyā
S04bsu036_u:6020_3: parivṛtaḥ puraskṛta imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchati mama darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya,
S04bsu036_u:6022: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto bhagavantametadavocat - kastena bhagavan kulaputreṇa kuśalasaṃbhāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6023: yena sa kuśalasaṃbhāreṇa kṛtenopacitena ayaṃ viśeṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ?
S04bsu036_u:6026: tatra ya vayaṃ bhagavan samādhau carema /
S04bsu036_u:6027: taṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ paśyema,
S04bsu036_u:6033: tatsādhu bhagavan karotu tathāgatastathārūpaṃ nimittaṃ yena nimittena saṃcoditaḥ samānaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchet //
S04bsu036_u:6034_0: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastaṃ bhagavantaṃ prabhūtaratnaṃ
S04bsu036_u:6035: gadgadasvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātumāgacchet /
S04bsu036_u:6036_0: atha khalu bhagavān prabhūtaratnastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ parinirvṛtastasyāṃ
S04bsu036_u:6036_1: velāyāṃ tathārūpaṃ nimittaṃ prāduścakāragadgadasvarasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya
S04bsu036_u:6036_2: saṃcodanārtham - āgaccha kulaputra imāṃ sahāṃ lokadhātum /

S04bsu036_u:6483: atha khalu sa rājā śubhavyūhaḥ sā ca vimaladattā rājabhāryā śatasahasramūlyaṃ muktāhāraṃ bhagavata uparyantarīkṣe 'kṣaipsīt /
S04bsu036_u:6484: samanantarakṣiptaśca sa muktāhārastasya bhagavato mūrdhni muktāhāraḥ kūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūccaturasraścatuḥsthūṇaḥ samabhāgaḥ suvibhakto darśanīyaḥ /

S04bsu036_u:6487: atha khalu rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyaitadabhavat - mahānubhāvamidaṃ buddhajñānam,
S04bsu036_u:6489: yatra hi nāma ayaṃ tathāgatavigrahaḥ kūṭāgāramadhyagataḥ saṃdṛśyate prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkaratayā samanvāgataḥ //
S04bsu036_u:6490_1: parṣadaḥ āmantrayate sma - paśyatha bhikṣavo yūyaṃ śubhavyūhaṃ rājānaṃ gaganatalasthaṃ
S04bsu036_u:6492: bhagavānāha - eṣa khalu bhikṣavaḥ śubhavyūho rājā mama śāsane bhikṣubhāvaṃ kṛtvā śālendrarājo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:6493: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān vistīrṇavatyāṃ lokadhātau /
S04bsu036_u:6495: tasya khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ śālendrarājasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya aprameyo bodhisattvasaṃgho bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:6497: samā pāṇitalajātā ca vaidūryamayī sā vistīrṇavatī lokadhāturbhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:6499: syāt khalu punaḥ kulaputrāḥ yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena śubhavyūho nāma rājābhūt?

S04bsu036_u:6503: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimaladattā nāma (Vaidya 263)
S04bsu036_u:6505: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam /

S04bsu036_u:6508: tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasyānukampāyai teṣāṃ ca sattvānāṃ rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya bhāryātvamabhyupagato 'bhūt /
S04bsu036_u:6509: syātkhalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmākaṃ kāṅkṣā vā vimatirvā vicikitsā vā - anyau tau tena kālena tena samayena dvau dārakāvabhūtām?
S04bsu036_u:6510: na khalu punaḥ kulaputrā yuṣmābhirevaṃ draṣṭavyam /
S04bsu036_u:6512: imau tau bhaiṣajyarājaśca bhaiṣajyasamundataśca tena kālena tena samayena tasya rājñaḥ śubhavyūhasya putrāvabhūtām /
S04bsu036_u:6513: evamacintyaguṇasamanvāgatau kulaputrā bhaiṣajyarājo bhaiṣajyasamudgataśca bodhisattvau mahāsattvau,
S04bsu036_u:6517: te sarve namaskaraṇīyā bhaviṣyanti sadevakena lokena //
S04bsu036_u:6518: asmin khalu punaḥ pūrvayogaparivarte bhāṣyamāṇe caturaśītīnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham //
S04bsu036_u:6519: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye śubhavyūharājapūrvayogaparivarto nāma pañcaviṃśatimaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:6523_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṇanāsamatikrāntairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ
S04bsu036_u:6523_1: sārdhaṃ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ prakampadbhiḥ kṣetrai pravarṣadbhiḥ padmaiḥ pravādyamānaistūryakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6524_0: mahatā bodhisattvānubhāvena mahatyā bodhisattvavikurvayā mahatyā bodhisattvaddharyā
S04bsu036_u:6524_1: mahata bodhisattvamāhātmyena mahatā bodhisattvasamāhitena mahatā bodhisattvatejasā jājvalyamānena,
S04bsu036_u:6527_1: puraskṛtaḥ evamacintyairṛddhiprātihāryaiḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ
S04bsu036_u:6528: sa yenagṛdhrakūṭaḥ parvatarājaḥ yena ca bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmat /
S04bsu036_u:6529_0: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya saptakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavantametadavocat
S04bsu036_u:6529_1: - ahaṃ bhagavaṃstasya bhagavato ratnatejobhyudgatarājasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrādihāgataḥ
S04bsu036_u:6529_2: iha bhagavan sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo deśyata iti /

S04bsu036_u:6532: tatsādhu bhagavān deśayatu tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha imaṃ saddharmapuṇḍārīkaṃ dharmaparyāyameṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ vistareṇa /
S04bsu036_u:6533: evamukte bhagavān samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - uddhaṭitajñā hi kulaputra ete bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6534: api tvayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo yaduta asaṃbhinnatathatā /

S04bsu036_u:6538_0: tāsāṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye pratiṣṭhāpanārthaṃ punarapi bhagavān samantabhadraṃ
S04bsu036_u:6538_1: bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - caturbhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya
S04bsu036_u:6538_2: mātṛgrāmasya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo hastagato bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:6545: ebhiḥ kulaputra caturbhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatasya mātṛgrāmasya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo hastagato bhaviṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:6546_0: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - ahaṃ bhagavan
S04bsu036_u:6546_1: paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ
S04bsu036_u:6550: yathā na kaścitteṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāmavatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate /

S04bsu036_u:6552: na māraputrā na mārakāyikā devaputrā na mārakanyā na mārapārṣadyā yāvanna bhūyo māraparyutthito bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:6553: na devaputrā na yakṣā na pretā na pūtanā na kṛtyā na vetālāstasya dharmabhāṇakasyāvatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
S04bsu036_u:6554: ahaṃ bhagavaṃstasya dharmabhāṇakasya satatasamitaṃ nityakālaṃ rakṣāṃ (Vaidya 265) kariṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:6555: yadā ca sa dharmabhāṇako 'smin dharmaparyāye cintāyogamanuyuktaścaṃkramābhirūḍho bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:6556_0: tadāhaṃ bhagavaṃstasya dharmabhāṇakasyāntike śvetaṣaḍdantaṃ gajarājamabhiruhya tasya
S04bsu036_u:6557: yadā punastasya dharmabhāṇakasya asmin dharmaparyāye cintāyogamanuyuktasya sataḥ ito dharmaparyāyadantaśaḥ padavyañjanaṃ paribhraṣṭaṃ bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:6558: tadāhaṃ tasmin śvetaṣaḍdante gajarāje 'bhiruhya tasya dharmabhāṇakasya saṃmukhamupadarśayitvā imaṃ dharmaparyāyamavikalaṃ pratyuccārayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:6559_0: sa ca dharmabhāṇako mamātmabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā imaṃ ca dharmaparyāyamavikalaṃ mamāntikācchrutvā
S04bsu036_u:6559_1: tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhūyasyā mātrayā asmin dharmaparyāye vīryamārapsyate,
S04bsu036_u:6560: āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhūyasyā mātrayā asmin dharmaparyāye vīryamārapsyate,

S04bsu036_u:6565_1: vā upāsakā vā upāsikā vā evaṃ sūtrāntadhārakā evaṃ sūtrāntalekhakā evaṃ sūtrāntamārgakā
S04bsu036_u:6565_2: evaṃ sūtrāntavācakā ye paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāmasmin dharmaparyāye
S04bsu036_u:6567: tameva śvetaṃ ṣaḍdantaṃ gajarājamabhiruhya bodhisattvagaṇaparivṛtaḥ ekaviṃśatime divase teṣāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ caṃkramamāgamiṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:6568: āgatya ca tān dharmabhāṇakān parisaṃharṣayiṣyāmi samādāpayiṣyāmi samuttejayiṣyāmi saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:6570: yathā te dharmabhāṇakā na kenaciddharṣaṇīyā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:6571: na caiṣāṃ manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraṃ lapsyante,
S04bsu036_u:6577: teṣāṃ vayaṃ bhagavan dharmabhāṇakānāmimāni dhāraṇīpadāni dāsyāmi /
S04bsu036_u:6579_0: adaṇḍe daṇḍapati daṇḍāvartani daṇḍakuśale daṇḍasudhāri sudhārapati buddhapaśyane
S04bsu036_u:6579_1: sarvadhāraṇi āvartani saṃvartani saṃghaparīkṣite saṃghanirghātani dharmaparīkṣite
S04bsu036_u:6579_2: sarvasattvarutakauśalyānugate siṃhavikrīḍite anuvarte vartani vartāli svāhā //
S04bsu036_u:6580: imāni tāni bhagavan dhāraṇīpadāni yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrotrendriyasyāvabhāsamāgamiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:6582: ayaṃ ca bhagavan saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo 'smin jambudvīpe pracaramāṇo yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ hastagato bhaviṣyati,
S04bsu036_u:6583_0: tairbhagavan dharmabhāṇakairevaṃ veditavyam - samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānubhāvena
S04bsu036_u:6583_1: yadasmākamayaṃ dharmaparyāyo hastagataḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tejasā /
S04bsu036_u:6585: mahāsattvasya caryāyāste bhagavan sattvā lābhino bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:6592: likhitvā ca te bhagavannidaṃ sūtramitaścyutvā trāyastriṃśatāṃ devānāṃ sabhāgatāya upapatsyante,
S04bsu036_u:6594: bherīmātreṇa mukuṭena te devaputrāstāsāmapsarasāṃ madhye sthāsyanti /
S04bsu036_u:6595: īdṛśaḥ kulaputrā imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā puṇyaskandhaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6596: kaḥ punarvādo ye etamuddekṣyanti svādhyāyiṣyanti cintayiṣyanti manasi kariṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:6597: tasmāttarhi kulaputrāḥ satkṛtya ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo likhitavyaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6606: tasmāttarhi kulaputrāḥ paṇḍitena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyaḥ satkṛtya likhitavyaḥ satkṛtyoddeṣṭavyaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6609: imaṃ kulaputrā dharmaparyāyaṃ likhitvā uddiśya svādhyāyitvā bhāvayitvā manasikṛtvā evamaprameyā guṇā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:6610: tasmāttarhi tena paṇḍitena bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā ayaṃ saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyo dhārayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6613: yathā bhagavan mamādhiṣṭhānena ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo 'smin jambudvīpe pracariṣyati //
S04bsu036_u:6614: atha khalu tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ samantabhadrāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu samantabhadra,
S04bsu036_u:6615: yatra hi nāma tvamevaṃ bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya pratipannaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6619: ye kecit kulaputrāḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmadheyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:6621: ayaṃ ca saddharmapuṇḍarīko dharmaparyāyastasya bhagavataḥ śākyamunerantikācchrutaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6624: anumoditaścāyaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhaviṣyati śākyamuninā ca tathāgatena teṣāṃ mūrdhni pāṇiḥ pratiṣṭhāpito bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:6626: tathāgataśāsanaparigrāhakāśca te samantabhadra kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro (Vaidya 267)
S04bsu036_u:6630: na nṛttakā na mallā na nartakā na śauṇḍikaurabhrikakaukkuṭikasaukarikastrīpoṣakāḥ sattvāsteṣāmabhirucitā bhaviṣyanti /
S04bsu036_u:6631: īdṛśāṃśca sūtrāntān śrutvā likhitvā dhārayitvā vācayitvā vā na teṣāmanyadabhirucitaṃ bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:6638: na dveṣo na moho nerṣyā na mātsaryaṃ na mrakṣo na māno nādhimāno na mithyāmānaḥ /
S04bsu036_u:6640: yaḥ samantabhadra paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāmasya saddharmapuṇḍarīkasya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakaṃ bhikṣuṃ paśyet,
S04bsu036_u:6648: ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ paścime kāle paścime samaye paścimāyāṃ pañcaśatyāṃ vartamānāyāṃ dhārayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:6654: ya evaṃ sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ dharmabhāṇakānāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ mohaṃ dāsyanti,
S04bsu036_u:6657: teṣāṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme kāyaścitro bhaviṣyati /
S04bsu036_u:6667: ye īdṛśānāṃ sūtrāntalekhakānāṃ sūtrāntavācakānāṃ ca sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ ca sūtrāntadeśakānāṃ ca apriyāṃ vācaṃ bhūtāmabhūtāṃ vā saṃśrāvayiṣyanti,
S04bsu036_u:6669: tasmāttarhi samantabhadra asya dharmaparyāyasya dhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ dūrata eva pratyutthātavyam /
S04bsu036_u:6671: tathā teṣāmeva sūtrāntadhārakāṇāṃ bhikṣūṇāmevaṃ gauravaṃ kartavyam //
S04bsu036_u:6672: asmin khalu punaḥ samantabhadrotsāhanaparivarte nirdiśyamāne gaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ koṭīśatasahasrāvartāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho 'bhūt //
S04bsu036_u:6673: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye samantabhadrotsāhanaparivarto nāma ṣaḍviṃśatimaḥ //

S04bsu036_u:6690: evamuktāste bodhisattva mahāsattva bhagavatā śākyamuninā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena mahatā prītiprāmodyena sphutā abhūvan /
S04bsu036_u:6691_0: mahacca gauravamutpādya yena bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhana samyaksaṃbuddhastenāvanatakāyāḥ
S04bsu036_u:6691_1: praṇatakāyāḥ saṃnatakāyāḥ śirāṃsyavanāmya añjaliṃ pragṛhya sarva ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa
S04bsu036_u:6691_2: bhagavantaṃ śākyamuniṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhametadūcuḥ - tathā bhagavan
S04bsu036_u:6696: traitīyakamapi sa sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇa ekasvaranirghoṣeṇa evaṃ bhāṣate sma - alpotsuko bhagavān bhavatu yathāsukhavihārī /
S04bsu036_u:6697: tathā bhagavan kariṣyāmo yathā tathāgata ājñāpayati /
S04bsu036_u:6699: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamunistathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sarvāṃstāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānanyebhyo lokadhātubhyaḥ samāgatān visarjayati sma /
S04bsu036_u:6700: yathāsukhavihāraṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmārocayati sma - yathāsukhaṃ tathāgatā viharantvarhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā iti /
S04bsu036_u:6701: taṃ ca tasya bhagavataḥ prabhūtaratnasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya ratnastūpaṃ yathābhūmau sthāpayāmāsa /
S04bsu036_u:6705: te cāprameyā asaṃkhyeyāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anyalokadhātvāgatā ratnavṛkṣamūleṣu siṃhāsanopaviṣṭāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6706: prabhutaratnaśca tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sa ca sarvāvān bodhisattvagaṇaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6707: te ca viśiṣṭacāritrapramukhā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā bodhisattva mahāsattvā ye pṛthivīvivarebhyo 'bhyudgatāḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6708: te ca mahāśrāvakāḥ tāśca catasraḥ parṣadaḥ,
S04bsu036_u:6710: iti śrīsaddharmapuṇḍarīke dharmaparyāye 'nuparīndanāparivarto nāma saptaviṃśatimaḥ samāptaḥ //
S04bsu036_u:6712: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S04bsu036_u:6713: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
